237a1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni zla bo gang dang mtshungs/ /dngos po yod dang med nyid min/ /ji lta zla ba mtshungs nyid yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i
237a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rdzogs pa'o/ /ji skad du/ snying po dag pa bzlas nas ni/
237a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni dbus su rtogs pa ni/ /zla pa'i dbus su yang zla ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o zhes bya ba ni/
237a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni gnas pa'o/ /ji skad du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje chen po sems byed cing/ /thad gcig so sor brtags pa ni/ /shin tu brtan pa mthong 'gyur nas zhes
237a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa tshad med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa'i snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje las sku gsung thugs byung
237a6(rgyud 'grel): nas spyod pa tshad med pa mdzad cing skye po'i snod du gyur par mdzad cing/ 'dus pa las rdo rjer gyur pa'o/ /ji skad du/ snying po dag pa bzlas nas ni/ /rdo rje lus su rnam bsgom pa/ /des ni sra brtan khong stod med/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas/
237a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o zhes
237b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gzugs sku chos sku bcas bya'o/ /ji skad du/ snying po dag la blangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas
237b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i ye shes dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa'o/ /ji skad du/ rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu bsten/ /de nas sangs rgyas
237b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni/ /rdo rje'i thugs ka nas byung ste/ /chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis/ /de che thub pa dbang bskur 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i dbang po de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa kun rdzogs pas de lta bas
237b4(rgyud 'grel): na zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor kyi don du gnas pa'o ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can kyi don mdzad pa dang
237b5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ ngan 'gro sbyang zhing dkyil 'khor du gcug pa'i sgo nas so/ /mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par shes par bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbang thob pa'i sgo nas ste/ de ltar na 'di la the tshom dang yon
237b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi dang yid gnyis ma byed cig /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas med do zhes bya'o/ /yang na bsod nams kyi tshogs brgyad dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyi yon tan dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ shes rab dang lags
237b7(rgyud 'grel): pa mchod pa dang/ sems can gyi don dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang/ smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gang zag la bdag med pa la sogs pa dang/ nyan thos kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa
238a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bar 'gyur pa'i rgyu la som nyi la sogs pa ma byed cig ces bya ba'i don to/ /'dis ni sbyong ba dang po bsgom pa rnams kyis bdag mngan par byang chub pa bskyed de byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba ldan pas
238a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gro dgug /dkyil 'khor du bcug dbang bskur bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya che zhing che ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
238a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal dang bral ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa bya bar ston to/ /'dis ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis mchod cing bstod pa drin lan gyi tshul tu
238a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyan bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgya byin nyid sems can gyi tshe phyi ma'i don dang/ snying rje chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dang/ bsam pa rdzogs pa'i rgyur shes rab bskyed cig ces byang dang yang
238a5(rgyud 'grel): ? gsal ba btab pa'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa dang/ zhugs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris zhes bya ba ni/ ga na pa ti la
238a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ brgya byin gyi ris te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris so/ /'di nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba gcig shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas zhes bya ba ni/ las ci zhig stobs kyis
238a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'phos? pa'o/ /dgung bdun lags na zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i zhag bdun mi'i lo bdun brgya lon pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes zhes bya ba ni/ gnas gang du skyes pa dris pa'o/ /bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ci zhig myong bar 'gyur zhes bya
238b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ 'bras bu dris pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni yid la bcags nas yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po ci
238b2(rgyud 'grel): ste dus las bab par shes na zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po sbrul pa yin pa'i phyir dus mkhyen pas so/ /nyon cig ces bya ba ni thos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis zung zhig pa'i don to/ /lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni dus
238b3(rgyud 'grel): la bab lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni dus la bab lags so/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro
238b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ji lta bu zhig ces dmyal ba chen por lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar dang/ dmyal ba chu du rnams su lo stong phrag brgya dang/ khyol song dang/ yi dwags kyi gnas su lo brgya phrag brgya dang/ mI skye gnas su rna ba dang smra ba'i skyon lo stong phrag bcu dang/ sdug bsngal brgyud pa dang/ gzhan la
238b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa byed pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyud ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du sdug bsngal myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa dang/ de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu sdangs shing zhes
238b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dag gi sgo nas skrag te skyo nas zhes bya ba sems kyi sgo nas kha spub du 'gyel bar gyur to zhes bya ba lus kyi tshul gyis 'gyel bar gyur pa'o/ /'dis ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa'i brgya byin la sogs pa ston to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
238b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gdol to/ /sdug bsngal chen po rgyud pa 'di las bcom ldan 'das ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di las rnam par grol
239a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa 'di bskyab bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bshad pa 'di nyon cig ces bya ba ni/ phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi
239a2(rgyud 'grel): ni nye bar mtshon pa ste/ sangs rgyas grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das la bskul zhing du mar snang ba'i tshul gyis 'di bshad ces bya ba'i don to/ /'dis ni gsang sngags/ kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis lus la dkyil 'khor
239a3(rgyud 'grel): brtag zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so// //de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ston pa ste/ de nas zhes bya ba ni sbyong ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o//
239a4(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor sprul zhing gsang sngags gsung ba'i don du slar yang zhes pa'i don to/ /me tog man da ra ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa me tog dang rgyan gyi khyad par gyis mtsher
239a5(rgyud 'grel): te bskor phyag 'tshal legs zhes bya bas mnyes par byas/ de nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang zhes bya ba tshe phyi ma'i don dang/ bde bar bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba tshe 'di'i don dang/
239a6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsum las thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor yod na dbang dang dam tshig yod pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor
239a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprul zhing bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas gzhan yang sprul pa'i 'khor tshangs pa la sogs pa yang lha mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs so bcom ldan 'das legs so//
239b1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam thos pas kyang ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol te bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag
239b2(rgyud 'grel): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par gsol zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'bras bu 'di rnams dang ldan pas bshad par gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting
239b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gnas 'byung ba byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ khas
239b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub tu 'gyel ba bslang te rgyud sgyangs la dam tshig dang dbang thob par byas nas dkyil 'khor du lha dgod pa'i don du'o/ /ji lta bu zhig la zhe na/ gdon mi za ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ 'bras bu yod cing don yod la mi
239b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i rdo rje des pa bskyed pa'i don du ming de skad ces bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig tu zad dam zhe na ma yin te/ oM badzra a d+hiSh+Tha na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ thugs kha nas phyung
239b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags gsungs pas/ lha'i bu rnams rgyud sbyang ba dang/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bstan to/ /gzhan yang snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za ba'i mi tshoms pa'i rdo
239b7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni kyang zhes bya ba'i don dbang bskur ba bsdu'o/ /gdon mi za bar ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba la the tshom med pa'o/ /mi chod pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu'i chos kyi sku'o/ /byin
240a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas so/ /byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni/ chu yis dbang bskur nas te/ gzhan yang dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig kun gyi bskur ro zhes bya ba'i
240a2(rgyud 'grel): tha tshig go /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dang/ ngo bo nyid dang/ rten dang/ gnas sbyong ba ste/ thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /de ston pa'i sgra la yang
240a3(rgyud 'grel): nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'o/ /rang nyid kyang nges pa'i ye shes las sgra'i gzugs su phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /oM sho d+hA ni zhes bya ba nas shu d+he swAhA zhes bya
240a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar ro/ /rig pa chen po 'di bshad ma thag tu ces bya ba ni/ gsungs pa dang/ spul ba'o/ /de'i phan yon sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to/ /de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so ces bya ba la/ de nas
240a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba kun rig gi gsang sngags gsungs pa'i rjes thogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang zhes bya ba slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gsang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni/ thugs dang yon tan dang/ gsung dang 'phrin las so/ /ston pa'i sgra la
240a6(rgyud 'grel): yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya'o/ /'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'o/ /oM sho d+hA ni sho d+hA ya sarba/ a pa yA na zhes bya ba ni/ ngan song sbyong ba dang/ rin chen tog dang/ shAkya'i dbang po dang/ me tog cho rgyas
240a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi thun mong gi snying po yin no/ /sarba sangs b+hya hUM zhes bya ba dang/ haM ces bya ba dang/ tra a zhes bya ba dang/ rin chen tog la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis snying po ste/ phyis 'byung ba las shes par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni
240b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang sbyin pa dang shes rab dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ snying rje la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces bya'o/ /oM sarba a pA ya bi sho
240b2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ne zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas spyan dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams kyi thun mong gi snying po yin no/ /hUM phaT ces bya ba dang/ traM haM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba khyad par gyi snying po'o/ /lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni/ de bzhin
240b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang ces bya ba ni thugs so/ /nye ba'i snying po'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces pa'o/ /oM traT ces bya ba ni sdig pa gzhom pa'i snying po'o/ /lha'i dbang po 'di ni gzhan
240b4(rgyud 'grel): yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad sbyor ba'i snying po'o zhes bya ba ni shar gyi gtso bo'i khyad par snying po'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te lhag ma rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams su shes par
240b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sta'i dbang po gzhan yang mngon na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can thams cad ngan song gi rgyud thams cad kyi bde blag tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus na dran pa tsam
240b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis slob bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin te/ lha thams cad bskyed pa dang/ rgyas gdab pa dang/ snying gdab pa dang/ khrus bya ba dang/ kun la mchog tu gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i rig pa ste/ na mo b+ha ga wa te zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ swA hA'i?
240b7(rgyud 'grel): mthar thugs go?/ /sarba bid ces bya ba nas brtsams te/ oM b+ha ye shes pa'i mthar thug pa rnams tshe 'di'i phan yon la gnas pa 'am/ shi ba'i lus la gdags pa dang/ bzlas brjod bya ba dang/ ba dang/ rtag par sha'i don bsgoms pa 
241a1(rgyud 'grel): stod pa yin te/ de gsungs pa lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gsang pa'i snying po 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de ston pa'i sgra la yang de skad ces
241a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal rigs la sogs pa du ma ste/ bu 'am bu mo gang yang rung bas zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi dgag pa med pa'o/ /ming tsam nyan tam zhes bya ba ming nyid nyan pa'o/ /bcangs
241a3(rgyud 'grel): sam zhes bya ba ni don dang tshig gi /bklags sam zhes bya ba ni/ kha thon nam glegs bam gyis so/ /de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi grog la sogs pa la bris nas kyang mgo bo'i gtsug pud dam dpung pa 'am mgul tu btags te 'chad na zhes bya ba ni tshe 'di
241a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la gnas pa'i gdags pa gsum bstan to/ /de nyid du gsungs pa'i tshe 'di nyid la bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid kyi phan yon dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad ni ming pa bsgags?
241a5(rgyud 'grel): ? shi ba la sogs pa'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang/ 'brel pa'i rmi lam gyi rnam pa 'am/ rmi lam gsum ste/ bag chags kyi rmi lam dang ltas bstan pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /des kyang mi 'byung la/ gzhan yang
241a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan song dam 'brel pa'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam du yang mi 'byung na zhes bya ba ni ma log pa na lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan pa la sogs pa'i phan yon bshad nas/ dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba zhugs
241a7(rgyud 'grel): la zhes bya ba bzhugs pa'i phan yon ston to/ /zhugs la zhes bya ba la dang por zhugs la zhugs nas dbang bskur nas gong du bshad pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed cing/ sngags kyi don bsgom pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba dang/ shi ba'i don
241b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'o/ /lta smos kyang ci dgos te zhes bya ba phul tu byung ba gsungs pa ste/ bstan pa'o/ /de nyid bshad pa/ de dag las sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur ngan song du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar tshe 'di la gnas
241b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phan yon bshad nas/ tshe 'das pa rnams kyi phan yon gyi dbang du byas nas/ skyes pa 'am bud med dam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ byol song dam/ yi dags sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang
241b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis/ dkyil 'khor du bcug cing dbang bskur na zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas cir 'gyur zhes 'bras bu gsungs pa sems can
241b4(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar skyes na yang/ de ma thag par yang thar nas lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i ris der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon du byed zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang/ skur pa 'debs pa dang bral
241b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos nyid thob ces bya ba'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyu nges pa can du yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su yang skye/
241b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa thams cad rab tu spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gang yang rung bar bde bar myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ nges
241b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dang/ mchod pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa spangs pa dang/ rigs kyi dngos grub dang/ 'jig rten pa'i
242a1(rgyud 'grel): lha dang/ ri lu sogs pa'i dngos grub gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/ /lha'i dbang por mdor na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad
242a2(rgyud 'grel): myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ mdor bsdu na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnyis su bsdus pas de'i phan pa dang/ bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa rnams kyi
242a3(rgyud 'grel): khang pa brtsegs ma dang/ ba ngan bskyed pa dang/ kun rig sprul nas thugs kar zla ba la sngags bkod nas/ lha rnams sprul pa dang/ bsgrub cing sngags 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to/ /ri rab tu sprul pa'i dus ni/ gtso bo grub pa'i dus
242a4(rgyud 'grel): su 'khor rnams grub pas/ gtso bo dang 'khor sbrul pa ma bstan to/ /de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to/ /de nas gtso bo dang
242a5(rgyud 'grel): tha mi dad par bsams te/ bsdu ba dang phyag dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ yang ched du brjod pa dang/ dbang blang ba dang/ dgug gzhug bya ba dang/ rgyas gdab pa dang/ kun gyi 'phrin las cig la sbyar ba dang kun de
242a6(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid bsdus pa dang/ gsang zhing sra ba'i mchog mthon po las bstan pa bzhin shes par bya'o/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to// //dam tshig dang dbang thob pas thabs 'di nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de
242a7(rgyud 'grel): nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las dang/ slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ston to/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni sdon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o/ /de yang 'dir lo 'am/ lo phyed dam/ zla ba gcig gam/ lha rnams grub nas zheS
242b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don to/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsal to/ /zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci zhig byas nas zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol zhes
242b2(rgyud 'grel): bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang/ bde bar bgyi ba dang/ ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad las rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang/ bla na ma mchis pas yang dag par
242b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bris pas mi rnams la phan pa'i don du ste/ /de'i phyir bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rje btsun bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni khyad par du bod
242b4(rgyud 'grel): pas gsol ba btab pa'o/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ zhes bya ba ni/ kun rig nyid mi yul du shAkya thub par gyur pa la dgongs nas de skad ces bshad de des so
242b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni/ der nges pa'i ye shes te/ dbyer mi byed pas rdo rje zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid de/ de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang
242b6(rgyud 'grel): de skad ces bya'o/ /de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad pa ste/ de mdzad nas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so
242b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor ni gzugs can dang/ gzugs med pa la gzugs med de/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med pa'i ye shes/ /de yang chos kyi bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i phyir dang snying po len pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o/ /chen po zheS 
243a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes gzugs sku dang bcas pa'o/ /'di zhes bya ba 'og nas byung ba 'di'o/ /gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o/ /gsungs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun
243a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang/ /de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs zhes bya pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/ /bla
243a3(rgyud 'grel): na med pa zhes bya ba ni/ sprod pa dang bral pa'o/ /rtogs 'gyur pa'i zhes bya ba ni/ khong du chud pa'o/ /de nyid ye shes zhes bya bas ston to/ /sus gsungS zhe na/ rgyal bas gsungs pa'i zhes bya ba smos so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor snying por
243a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs zhes bya ba la ni/ zhes bya ba ni nges par bzung ba ste/ nyid ces bya ba'i don to/ /dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bshad pa'o/ /rang bzhin du bshad pa de yang 'di yin te/ mi mnyam pa med
243a5(rgyud 'grel): pas ? bzhi yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams la rta babs bzhi zhes bya'o/ /gzugs rnams la kha
243a6(rgyud 'grel): khyer la brten pa'i lha mo rnams zhes bya'o/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa 'dul ba bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rlung gis dar 'phan bskyod nas sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o/ /ye shes me long zhes bya'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag me tog gi phreng
243a7(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba'o/ /mi zad pa'i bde ba dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang/ rin chen mchog nyi ma dang zla ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya'o/ /theg pa chen po mdo sde bskor ba ni rdo rje theg pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor lo ni chos kyi

243b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan/ /kun grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba can po zhes bshad do/ /de yi nang rim dag gi thig /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra ba ni/ /'dir rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster/

243b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs zhes pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po yang dag 'byud zhes bya ba dang/ sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyis/ /gad tshe byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /byang chub spyod la rjes chags pa/ /rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung/ /zhes pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams
244a1(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyes byed cing/ /legs so zhes bya rab ster byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed/ /de ni rdo rje legs par brjod ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ mi shes
244a2(rgyud 'grel): ? mun na nag 'joms pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin pa go rim bzhin du rdo rje rin chen dang/ gzi brjid dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gzhan pa bzhi yin te/ ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i
244a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa gang/ /mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /des na rdo rje rin chen brjod ces pa dang/ ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/ /mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing/ /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ de ni rdo rje gzi brjid do/ /zhes pa

244b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung/ /de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya ba? zhes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po/ /mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba te/ /tshig med tshig las yang dag byung zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyi/ /sems can smin pa

245b2(rgyud 'grel): tha dad pa yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis tha dang pa yod pa ma yin no/ /'dis ni gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i sbyang pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kyi de kho na nyid thog mar shes par gyis shig ces ston to/ /de ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor
245b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med pa gsungs nas/ da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gzugs dang bcas pa bstan to/ /de nas zhes bya bar mchad pa'o/ /yang zhes bya ba ni sdud pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugS
245b4(rgyud 'grel): brtsa ba'i slad du ces bya ba ni/ mi rn+nams ba ? po'i don du'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs dang bcas shing thams cad 'jug tu rung ba'o/ /'di gsungs so zhes pa ni/ mi rnams la phan pa'i don du bshad do/ /gtsug lag khang dang/

246a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyi chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /khru tshad kyis che chud brtag par bya/ /ba'i chu dang lci bas byug /sa bzung ba dang spyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ khrus byas lus dri chus byug/ rdo rje gnod

246a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ phyi rol du gter ma sbyin pa dang/ nye reg dang/ sbyin sreg dad/ mchod cing gsol ba gdab la sogs bya'o/ /'di tsam gyis ni gnas byin gyis brlab pa brtsam zhes bya ba'i don yin no/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni zhes
246a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni zhes? bya ba nyid du'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ zhes pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis pa'o/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa gra dang bcas pas grwa bzhi pa la phyogs kyi cha re re zhing sgo bzhi yod pas sgo bzhi pa zhes byed/ /rta babs bzhi
246b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa dang/ them skad bzhi'i phreng ba dang/ seng gi glang chen rnams kyis brgyan ces bya ba ni/ phyogs re re na rta bab re dang/ them skas phreng ba dang/ seng ge glang po che rnams kyis mdzes par byas pas de skad ces bya'o/ /dang dang lnga ldi'i do
246b2(rgyud 'grel): shal phred/ /dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan ces bya ba ni/ der gyi lnga ldi dang/ mu tig gi do shal dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ dril bu g.yer kha la sogs pa dang/ rngams mdzes par byas pa la de skad ces bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang/ rgya gram
246b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi phyag rgyas brgyan ces bya ba ni/ shar phyogs su rdo rje/ lhor rin po che/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brgyan cing sprul pa'o/ /srad bu brgyan dang ldan pa dang/ phyi'i sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan ces bya ba ni/ tshangs thig gnyis dang/ sbyar?
246b4(rgyud 'grel): rig gnyis dang/ shar phyogs dang nub? dang byang dang/ lho phyogs kyi thig ste/ brgyad dang ldan pa dang/ sgo khyung ni mdzes pa dang/ rjes su mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni rtsig par ston pa'i cha gnyis te/ de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /dgu 'cher ni bsgol ba las zhes bya ba
246b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas gru bzhi pa/ chad du dang ldan par dgos pa las so/ /sgo dang sga khyud sum char bya zhes bya ba ni/ sgo dang sgo khyud la cha chen gcig gnas par byas pas/ sum cha'i yongs su char 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje srang bus thig gdab po
246b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje srad bur byin gyis brlabs las gdab po/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa zhes bya ba ni/ dbus kyi yang dbus kyi thig gdab pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dra ba la ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje dang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lta bu ma yin pa/
246b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba'o/ /yang na lte ba dang/ rtsibs dang/ gsum chos kyi 'khor lo gsum dang 'dra ba'o/ /yang na stod pa nyid bcu drug chos yin la/ de yang 'khor lo ni 'dra ba'o/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug ces bya ba ni lte ba dang/
247a1(rgyud 'grel): brtsibs rten dang bcas shing/ rtsibs bcu drug du grangs nges pa'o/ /rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la zhes bya ba ni/ lte ba'i rim pa dang/ rtsibs rten gyi rim pa dang/ rtsibs kyi rim pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur
247a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bya zhes pa ni/ rtsibs byang chub sems dpa' i gnas yin pas/ gtso bo'i gnas pas nyis 'gyur gyis chung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang lte ba la bskor ba'i dang po ni rtsibs rten no/ /gnyis pa ni rtsibs yin pa'i phyir/ rtsibS
247a3(rgyud 'grel): ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya zhes gsungs so/ /'di ni don slar yang gsal bar bya ste/ sa'i cha yid du 'ong ba dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi chad la/ thig byin gyis brlab cing bsgril ba dang/ rang rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de/ grogs po rdo rje
247a4(rgyud 'grel): las su bsgyed nas/ dang po rang shar du bltas te tshangs thig gdab/ de'i 'og tu byang du bltas te tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab/ me'i gnas su gnas la shar gyi thig gdab rlung gi phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig kyang gdab de nyid du 'dug ste/
247a5(rgyud 'grel): shar du bltas te byang du thig kyang gdab/ me'i mtshams su gnas nas lho phyogs kyi thig gdab/ de nyid du 'jug ste rlung phyogs su bltas te tshangs thig gdab par bya/ bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dug ste/ dbang ldan du kha bltas la zur thig gnyis pa gdab/
247a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gru bzhing gnas pa la/ cha chen bcu drug gdab par bya'o/ /tha mar cha chen gnyis gnyis par bya'o/ /dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa gnyis gdab/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag tu 'byung ro/ /de nas cha phra mo gdab par bya ba ni/ cha chen dgu ru gnas pa
247a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ tha mar lnga pa'i phyed por ba la lhag ma brgyad la bzhi bzhir gdab po/ /gsum pa dang de bzhin du lnga pa yang ngo/ /phyi rol gyi sgo dang/ nang gi sgo khyud dang/ logs su 'gyur ro/ /lnga pa'i phyed nang du por nas/ phyi rol gnyis su gdab/ drug pa
247b1(rgyud 'grel): la cha bran bzhi btab la/ bdun pa'i nang rol cha chung gcig gdab bo/ /cha gsum mi gdab/ dgu pa dang bcu pa bcu gcig pa bcu gnyis pa bzhi bzhir gdab po/ /de nas tshon gyis thig gdab par bya ste/ lnga pa phyed kyi dang po gdab bo/ /de nas gnyis
247b2(rgyud 'grel): bor gsum pa gdab/ yang gnyis por gsum pa gdab/ ngos dang 'gram dang ya phubs so/ /dgu pa'i nang gis cha chung gcig gdab/ /yang gnyis por la gcig gdab/ yang gnyis bzhag la gcig gdab/ ngos dang 'gram dang ya phubs su 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma
247b3(rgyud 'grel): ni ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la/ tshangs thig gi phyogs gcig tu/ bcu gcig pa yongs su bskor ba yis rtsibs rten du 'gyur ro/ /de'i nang du phyogs gcig gi bzhi pa btab pas ka bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsibs
247b4(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi phyi rol gsum bor bal rtsibs bcu drug tu bya ste/ gtso bo'i gnas pas phyed kyis chung ba nyis 'gyur du bya'o/ /bzhi pa yongs su bskor pas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni/ /dung dang kun da zla 'dra ba zhes pa ni/
247b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni/ kha dog dung dang kun da dang/ zla ba dang 'dra ba la mchog tu phul du byung ba'o/ /dbyibs dang gdan dang rgyan ci zhig ce na/ zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yi/ /seng+ge'i gdan dang bzhugs
247b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya ldan pa dang/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /zhes gsungs so/ /zhal bzhi pa la zhes bya ba sku gcig la zhal bzhi'o/ /de yi yang 'og nas de'i spyan sngar ngan song kun 'dren shar phyogs la gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /seng+ge'i gdan
247b7(rgyud 'grel): la zhes seng+ge gdan zla ba pa'o/ /rdo'i gzhugs pa dang zhes sbyar ro/ /'dis ni rdo rje dkyil krung gis bzhugs par bstan te/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang/ rgyan rnams can gyis brgyan bar bri zhes bya ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyis phyag rgya dang/ dbu rgyan la sogs pas
248a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par bri ba dang/ bzhag pa dang/ dgod ces bya ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i spyan sngar de shar du'o/ /ngan song kun sbyor ba'i rgyal po bri ste/ phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol/ kha dog ji lta
248a2(rgyud 'grel): bu zhe na/ zla ba rgyas dang ba mo'i mdog /rgyan ji lta bu zhe na/ rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la/ /rgyal mchog bskyes bu gang pa bri zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal mchog gang bas mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin gyis rgyan par ston la/ snga
248a3(rgyud 'grel): mas ni gsal pa'i rgyan ston to/ /rgyab tu shAkya rigs dbang po/ /gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni/ nub kyi phyogs su shAkya thub pa kha dog dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni/
248a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis zhes bya ba ni/ lho dang byang du'o/ /rin chen me tog kha dog sngon po mchog sbyin phyag rgya dang/ byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas kha dog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya can bri zhing dgod par bya'o/ /'di
248a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gi gdan yang glang po che la sogs pa ji skad du bshad pa bzhid shes par bya'o/ /lau tsa na dang mA ma kI/ de bzhin gos dkar sgrol ma rnams/ /rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin/ /grwa yi phyog ni kun tu bri zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
248a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas spyan dang/ mU ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams/ rang gi rigs gtso bo'i kha dog dang mtshan ma can dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ utpal rnams go rim bzhin du phyag g.yas na 'dzin cing/ grwa'i phyogs kun tu bri
248a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems dpa' rnams/ /go rim bzhin du bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni/ ? bas bcu drug pa'i nang thams cad du rdo rje song?
248b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams/ dbang ldan gyi mchams nas brtsams te/ go rim bzhin du bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /mkhas pas lA skye la sogs pa/ mchod pa grwa'i phyogs su bri zhes bya ba ni dkyil
248b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi mdog dang/ dbyibs la byad bas lA skye la sogs pas mchod pa brgyad nang gi grwa dang/ phyi rol gyi grwar bri zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sgo'i phyogs ni thams cad du zhes bya ba ni/ shar la sogs pa bzhir ni bri bar bya zhes bya'o/ /rta babs khyams ni
248b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ zhes bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni kyang zhes bya ba'i ston to/ /de nas 'di ltar 'gyur te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs kyi gnas dang/ nang gi khams nyid kyi nang du bri zhes bya ba ste/ bstan pa'o/ /de nyid bshad pa byams pa la sogs bri bar bya/
248b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ nang gi khyams nyid du byams pa la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o/ /rta babs kyi gnas cho dang ldan pa dga' po la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o/ ba gcod mdzad la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o/ /gnyis pa
248b5(rgyud 'grel): la nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad du zhes bya ste/ nyid kyi gcud cho dang ldan pa dga' po la sogs pa bcu drug bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la nyon mongs 'joms pa 'jigs med gdud pa sel ba la sogs pa bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /khro po mdag? pa pho nya rnams
248b6(rgyud 'grel): bri bya yang na ming yang rung zhes bya ba ni/ khro bo nyid mdag pa yang yin la pho nya yang yin pas de skad ces bya'o/ /bri 'am yang na ming bri yang rung zhes bya ba ni 'bri ba 'am ming de yi ger dgod pa'ang rung ste/ phyag mtshan du dgod par bya zhes bya ba'i don
248b7(rgyud 'grel): to/ /'dis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bsgom pa ston to/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum snang dang 'jig rten 'jig go /lho phyogs kyi sgor 'jig rten gsum thar byed dang 'jig rten gsum 'dul lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
249a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ be tson sngon po byang phyogs kyi sgor mi g.yo mgon po dang/ rta mgrin bri bar bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bstan pa'i de nyid kyi phyi rol du mu ran dkar po bri zhing/ de nyid kyi bar du/ gling
249a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po ni bri bar bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa dri/ /byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che/ /shar dang nub kyi gling du ni/ /brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad kyang/ /'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs su brgya byin 'khor dang
249a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ lho phyogs su tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas/ nub phyogs su gtogs 'dod 'khor dang bcas/ byang phyogs su mahA de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te zhes bya ba ni/ brgya byin nas
249a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te/ dbang ldan gyi mthar thug pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi 'khor bshad pa/ lha min zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /lha min zhes bya ba sum brtsegs dang/ rab sim dang/ her na ke shu dang/ kun tu snang ba la sogs
249a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dri ma'i? rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung la sogs pa'o/ /nam mkha' i lding gser mig la sogs pa'o/ /gnod sbyin nor 'dzin la sogs pa'o/ /srin po u ba kar+Ni pur+Nu la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang de bzhin du lto 'phye chen po dang/ yi dwags dang/
249a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dre rnams dang/ klu dang sbrul dang/ rgyal po bzhi rnams dang/ gza' dang/ skar ma rgyu skar dang/ khro ba ma rungs po 'tshe ba'i bgegs dang/ bi na ya ka rnams dang/ sems can kun la phan pa byed pa'i drang srod bskal pa chen po rnams dang/ mkha' 
249a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma bud med rnams dang/ srin mo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ 'byung po bzhi lha chen po rnams dang/ khyim dang ri dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ nags tshal dang/ grong khyer na gnas pa rnams kyang bri ste/ ming du bzhag pa dang/ phyag rgyar bzhag pa dang/
249b1(rgyud 'grel): thig? le tsam du bri bar bya ste/ 'khor 'di rnams kyi kha dog la sogs ma bshad do/ /'di ni 'di skad du ston pa yin te/ thig btab pa'i rjes thogs la'o/ /tshon gyis las rnams byas nas/ tshon dgye ba sngon du 'gro bas lha rnams bzhag cing
249b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams ni ming dang/ phyag rgya dang/ thig le tsam du bris kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to/ /de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mkhas pas bzhag ces thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de yang dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i phyir/ bla re
249b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ gdubs dang/ rngam dang/ lnga ldi dang/ 'phan dang/ sna tshogs pa'i na bza' dang/ gser las byas pa'i bya brgyad dang bcu drug gam/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rung ba dang/ dbang bskur ba'i chus bkang ba'i
249b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa lnga dang/ me tog dang/ mar me dang/ gtor ma'i bum pa dang/ mdzes pa'i bshos la sogs pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba dang/ bca' ba sna tshogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su gtor ma
249b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ 'byung bo kun dang/ klu rnams dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin gyi kha zas su me tog dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ 'o ma dang/ li khad dang/ bcas pa bzhag par bya'o/ /slob ma ngag dbang bskur ba'i don rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa
249b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa dri'i chus rab tu bkang ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' i spyan sngar bzhag par bya'o/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag par bya'o/ /bum pa lhag ma rnams ni phyi rol gyi 'khor yug rnams la bzhag par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos
249b7(rgyud 'grel): klog pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor kun tu legs par bkod nas/ dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams te/ de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha rnams mchod pa ston te/ khrus la sogs pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ dang por khrus
250a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ gnas pas gang ba bkrus te nye reg bya/ sngon du bdag bsrung ba la sogs pa 'gro bas rgyan gdags dris byug /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas bskor ba bya/ chad pa dang lhag pa zhi bar bya/ sgo phye la zhes bya ba'i don to//
250a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dri dang phreng mchog phreng ba can/ /dri zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang zhes bya ba'i don yin no/ /kyang zhes bya ba'i don ni bsdu ba ste/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las rgyal
250a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgoms la/ mchod pa gsang ba bzlas brjod bya/ hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis yang sgo phye zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/ /mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te zhes bya ba ni/ gtso
250a4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas dpung par se gol brdab pa byas la/ dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de spyan drang ngo/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing/ lcags kyu la sogs bdag sbyor zhing/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdag phyag rgya dang
250a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang ldan pa'i sgo nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing ngo/ /ci zhig spyan drangs zhe na/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes rje bdag tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /gsung ba'i bcings pas bcings nas ni zhes bya
250a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni ? dam tshig dang/ chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab pas/ dam tshig gi bcing bas bcings zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag rgya gang zhig gis dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba/
250a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya ba ni/ mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te/ mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya ba ni lcags kyu'i 'o/ /mkhrig
250b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis mdud pa byas pa ni/ zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang zhes bya ba'o/ /de la lcags sgrog tshul du bya zhes bya ba ni/ mdzub mo gnyis gdub bus bcings pa'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis slar nang du bkug nas/ bskyod par gyur na dbang du
250b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes bya ba ni dril bu'o/ /de nas mtshan ma skyes te mgu nas ni/ /thog ma tha ma med par mngon sum mthong zhes bya ba ni/ de nas zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad pa ste/ spyan drangs/ lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas/ bgegs bsang mchod
250b3(rgyud 'grel): par bul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab/ dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to/ /mtshan ma skyes te zhes bya ba ni/ bsgoms pa dang bzlas pa bya bar bstan to/ /de'i 'bras bu khyad par mthong nas mgu nas ni/
250b4(rgyud 'grel): thog mdza' med par dngos po thams cad mngon par shes pa skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas mthong ba la sogs pa'i lha rnams la/ arga mchog brtags gsang la sogs pa yin no/ /dbyangs snyan pa'i bstod
250b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rdzas kyi/ mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod ces bya ba ni/ arga byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ gsang ba lA skye la sogs pa brgyad dang/ bstod pa rnams dbyangs snyan pa 'bul zhing/ lha rdzas kyi mchog dam pa gong du
250b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad ba bum pa rnams kyis legs par mchod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /'di skad du ston pa yin te dang po rdo rje 'dzin ma dang/ dpal gyi la gnyis lta bur bcings nas/ me tog gi phreng ba thogs te/ yid kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs
250b7(rgyud 'grel): la chad pa dang lhag pa zhi bar bya/ me tog gi phreng ba dod mgo la bcings/ oM badzra satwa hUM zhe kyang rgyun mi chad par bzlas bya ba/ hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sgo bzhi phye/ khrus byas dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs
251a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod de stan thog tu 'dug /lce la byin gyis brlab pa nas brtsams te/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rdzogs par bya la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dril bur stong pa brtags pa dang/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/ sdig pa thams cad bshags pa la sogs pa lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang/ bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
251a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa mngon du byas nas/ 'og min du phyin nas mngon par byang chub pa lngas rdo rje dbyings su bskyed de byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur pa sngon du 'gro ba dang bcas ste snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du/ ngan 'gro la sogs pa byas nas dkyil
251a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lus la brtags te/ nam mkha' i phyogs su gnas nas/ ri rab dang khang pa brtsegs pa la sogs bskyed de/ thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid zhu ba las/ kun rig gi skur gyur nas/ thugs ka'i zla ba la lha thams cad bskyed pa las
251a5(rgyud 'grel): tha mi dad par bsams te bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas/ phyag dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs nas yang ched du brjod pa dang/ rnal 'byor pas dbang blang zhing/ lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing
251a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i las la sbyar te/ mchod pa bsangs la bzlas par bya ba brjod cing/ hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sgo phye ste/ gtso bor bdag sbyor bas/ sangs rgyas rnams bsngas la/ lcags
251a7(rgyud 'grel): kyu la sogs pas las byas la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsangs la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de/ bsrung bas bstan par byas la/ mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya
251b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ las kyi phyag rgya dang/ phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la/ lha thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ sgom pa dang bzlas brjod mthong ba snang gi bar du byas la mthong ba gsal ba dang/ arga la sogs pa mchod pa
251b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga dang/ brgyad dang bstod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug la sogs pa rnams kyis spha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres shing skom pa la btung ba
251b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag /de'i gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya zhes bya ba ni/ dngos grub gsol ba'i lha rnams mchod pa/ de nas 'byung po kun zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi dkar gsum pa'i gtor ma bya ste/ sems
251b4(rgyud 'grel): can bkres pa la bza' pa dang zhes sbyar/ skom pa la btung ba dang/ phyogs skyong phyogs na gnas pa rnams spyan drangs te gtor ma sbyin/ 'khor rnams la de'i gtor ma ji ltar mthun zhing 'tsham par sbyin par bya ste/ de yang phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin
251b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'bras chen me tog chu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa las/ 'byung ba ltar gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas nye reg dang thod mthud byas la/ thob
251b6(rgyud 'grel): khung du me tog gi lha rnams spyan drangs la/ mar gyi dgang blugs la sogs pa phul la/ slar spyan drangs te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon thub che ba/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ /zhes
251b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di tsam gyis ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga ston to/ /de nas sngags pa zheS bya ba la sogS pa slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa ston to/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi/ /gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya/ /'gro la phan
252a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir myur du byang chub sems/ /de dag byang chub mchog sems bskyed du gzhug /de rnams byin brlab byang chub smon lam gdam/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la/ bsrung ba byas nas brtul zhugs sngom gnas pa
252a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i myur du byang chub tu 'gyur ba/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab cing bskyed pa dang/ sdig pa bshags/ rjes su yi rang bskul/ gsol ba gdab lam bsgom/ phyag
252a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal ba la sogs pas smon lam gdab pa dang/ lhag par gnas pa'i dus su zab cing rgya che ba'i ches bsgrags la/ bsrung bskur btags pas/ bsrung ba byas nas lhag par gnas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i dus nyid du brtul
252a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rang gi kha nas sngags zlos su gzhug par bya/ dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni/ rdo rje 'dzin mar dpal gyi pad+mar lag gnyis bya/ me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la/ g.yon
252a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis lag pa bkang ste bzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni/ slob dpon rang gi kha nas sngags brjod cing/ slob ma gzhug par bya ba dang/ dar dang ras dmar pos stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs byas/ /mig gnyis g.yogs nas rdo rje 'dzin mar
252a6(rgyud 'grel): dang la gyi pad mor lag pa gnyis byas la/ me tog la sogs pa'i phreng bas brgyan la yon 'bul du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhug pa'i sngags bstan pa ni/ sngags ni 'di rnams yin no zhes bya ba nas/ sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba'i bar
252a7(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o zhes bya ba nas sa ma ya stwaM/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis me tog dang rin po che la sogs pa dor ba bstan to/ /dor nas ci zhig byed ce na/ dngos grub tu 'gyur ba ni/ lha bzung zhing bsgrubs
252b1(rgyud 'grel): pas 'grub po zhes/ me tog rin chen la sogs pas/ gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs nas ni/ /dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med ces gsungs so/ /de nas sngags la mkhas pa yis zhes bya ba slob dpon gyis/ sngags 'dis
252b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni/ sngags 'dis brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ sbyin par bya ste/ oM zhes bya ba nas/ hUM zhes bya ba'i bar ro/ /de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrags par bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no
252b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar 'di yi don ni/ /slob dpon gyi dam tshig bsgrags par bya ba dang/ 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te/ dam tshig nyams na bsreg par byed/ dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub thob ces gsungs pa ni/ yang cis te dam tshig 'das na
252b4(rgyud 'grel): sdang zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' gshegs shing khros pas kyang rang gis brtsams pa bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa rlag par mdzad de/ skyon de ltar gnas pa de bas na/ rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig dang/ bla ma'i bka' mos pas bsrung
252b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /bsrung bar bya ba de nyid gang yin na/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ rdzun dang/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang/ chang btung ba dang/ sha la sogs pa bza' ba spang/ sems can gnod par sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya/ dkon
252b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum mi spang/ dus kun tu byang chub kyi sems dang/ snying po dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ lha dang bla ma mi spong/ sdig pa'i las mi bya/ bla ma'i bka' las mi 'da' lha la phul ba'i snying po dang/ bla ma'i grib ma dang/ phyag brgya'i
252b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la mi 'gom/ sngags dang lha la mi smad/ gzhan la gnod pa drag po mi bskul/ mu stegs can la mi smad/ dam pa'i chos la som nyi dang yid gnyis mi bya/ bdag gi de nyid sngags dang phyag rgyal sogs pa la yid gnyis mi bya 
253a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'di'i slar yang bsgrub pa'o/ /rim ni 'di yin te/ bslab pa lnga yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dge sbyong dam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung ba lhag par gnas ba'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas
253a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ mgon po de ring bdag 'tshal lo//
253a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig chen po de nyid gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ de nas yol ba'i mthar rdo rje bsrung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i ras shin tu dmar bas stod g.yogs smad g.yogs bskon zhing/ sgo bsrungs bzlas pa'i dar dkar
253a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gdong g.yogs bcings la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go /me tog thogs pas yang slob dpon la phyag byas la/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa yang byas la/ 'di skad ces brjod
253a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor bar
253a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /bskal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams
253a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rab brgyan cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ dbang bskur chen po rmad 'byung ba/ /sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur
253b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rigs la gsol ba gdab ste/ che ge mo zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gyis
253b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba chen por 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes kyang brjod par bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams zhes bya ba nas/ sems can mya ngan 'das
253b3(rgyud 'grel): la dgod zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /yang oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+tA da yA mi zhes bya bas byang chub sems bskyed nas/ snying gar rdo rje bzhag nas/ su ra te sa ma ya stwaM ha badzra sid+d+hi/ ya thA su khaM de nas badzra satwa/ zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems
253b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i dam tshig gi phyag rgya la/ rdo rje sems dpa' i byin brlabs la/ /rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes/ snying ga la sogs pa bzhir byin gyis brlabs la/ dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la/ yon gyi mchog phul te/ phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum
253b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dbang bskur la/ sa ma ya stwaM zhes bya bas rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag pa gnyis su shes par bya ste/ me tog gi phreng ba thogs la/ oM badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha badzra hUM/ a sa ma tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba
253b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas snying gar phye la/ rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus na yi ge a rdo rje dmar po'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsams nas/ slob ma'i snying ga nas gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blos
253b7(rgyud 'grel): bcug la/ lus thams cad gang bar bsams shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smrar gzhug go /de nas sems ma rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings
254a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di/ /da lta nyid du 'bab par shog /ces brjod du bcug la/ badzra a be sha/ a a a a A/ lan brgya'i bar du bzlas zhing
254a2(rgyud 'grel): dbab par bya'o/ /de nas snang ba bri bar bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba hUM pra tits+tsha badzra hUM zhes bya bas dor ro/ /yang na sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas dor ro/ /de nas mgo la bcing ba ni/ oM pra ti grah+No swa mi
254a3(rgyud 'grel): maM/ satwa mahA ba la zhes bya'o/ /dam tshig bsgrags par bya ste/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu zhes bya ba nas bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no zhes bya ba brjod do/ /de nas oM badzra hA syong g+hA Ta ya hUM zhes bya bas/ gdong g.yogS
254a4(rgyud 'grel): dgrol/ oM badzra pA hya hUM/ zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bstan/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag snying gar sgrol/ de ltar slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bshad nas/ dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa brtan
254a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas dam bca' i zhing/ sarbba bid kyis ji ltar dbang bskur te/ bum pa la sogs ji snyed mar thogs pas/ /bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu gcig gar bskul/ /de nas lag tu dril bu rdo rje sbyin/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen
254a6(rgyud 'grel): bdun tho gsal/ /mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thogs pa dang/ sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya zhes bya ba ni sdom pa 'dzin pas/ mos pa brtan pa dang ldan par dam bcas nas/ oM sarba bid a b+hi Shany+tsi zhes brjod cing/ ji
254a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar gsungs pa'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing/ gzhan yang dbu rgyan dang dar dbyangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang/ phyag rgya dang rdo rje dang/ las kyi rdo rje dang/ 'khor lo dang/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa gsang ba dang/ shes rab ye shes rnams
254b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ dbang bskur ba ji snyed thogs pas/ bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur ro/ /de nas lag pa g.yon du dril bu g.yas su rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang/ stong pa nyid du brtags la sbyin/ 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa rin po
254b2(rgyud 'grel): che sna bdun thogs la/ oM badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i phan yon ni/ mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir dang/ 'dis ni rin po che sna bdun gyi 'bras bu
254b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /thams cad kyi thun mong gi 'bras bu ni/ sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya zhes bya'o/ /de nas bka' i dbang bskur ba dang/ las kyi dbang bskur ba yang sbyin te/ phyis bshad par bya'o/ /de ltar dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro//
254b4(rgyud 'grel): ci'i phyir ji lta bu zhig ce na/ 'khrud par byed pas brten par byed pa bdag nyid gyi ngo bo dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon la bya'o/ /sngags bsgrub phyir du mos ldan slab ma la/ sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ brtser
254b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan dngos grub myur du 'grub ces bya ba'i bar gyis sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir slob dpon gyis bka' rab tu sgo zhing/ slob mas bla ma la yon phul te/ dam tshig sbyin pa bstan te/ go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do/ /slar yang 'di dag gi don bshad par bya
254b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgo dad nye bar pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa'i 'khor lo brtsibs brgyad pa legs par bris la/ de la slob ma rang gi lhar bskyed nas/ dri dang bdug pa dang/ me tog dang/ lha bshos dang/ mar mes yang dag par mchod de/ bkra
254b7(rgyud 'grel): shis kyi tshogs bcad 'don cing/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la/ oM sarba bid a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis/ spyi bo nas dbang bskur bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bum pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi ngan
255a1(rgyud 'grel): song sbyong ba'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing/ oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes bya ba dang/ gtso bo'i buM pas dbang bskur zhing/ bud+d+ha ka la sha/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM zhes bya ba dang/ rin chen tog gi buM pa dang/ oM ratna ka la sha a
255a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa twaM zhes bya ba dang/ shAkya'i dbang po'i bum pa dang oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsi h+ri zhes bya ba dang/ me tog che rgyas kyi bum pa dang/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa a zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu la
255a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o/ /dbu rgyan rigs yin na bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gtso bo yin na rin po che'i myur gu/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ bud+d+ha oM/ oM ratna traM/ pad+ma h+ri/ karma a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas/ oM dang a b+hi Shiny+tsa brjod pas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas
255a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che la sogs pa'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ oM ratna mA la/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM traM traM traM/ oM pa Ta pA laM pa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ shar phyogs pa yin na/ oM bud+d+ha mu dre a b+hi Shiny+tsa
255a5(rgyud 'grel): a? dbus su'o/ /oM badzra mu drags b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM shar du'o/ /lho nub byang rnams su traM h+ri a(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'gro/ phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la/ oM badzra nA ma/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM traM h+ri a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba brjod de/ ye shes
255a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /las kyi rdo rje sna tshogs las su byin la/ oM karma badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ zhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du bcug la/ oM badzra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+ruM/ oM tsakra a b+hi ba titwaM
255a7(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM hUM traM h+ri a(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsum du rigs kyis dbye bam brjod par bya'o/ /'khor los dbang bskur/ de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis 'khyud pa'i tshul du bzung la/ oM badzra d+ha ra Na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rin po che'i dril bu rin chen rdo rje dang 'khyud
255b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ oM ratna d+ha ba na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pad+ma'i rdo rje dril bu dang gand+ha d+ha ra Na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ri/ sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang/ karma d+ha ra Na/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a:de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i dril bu dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM zhes bya bas rigs
255b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dad pa'i sgo nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM zhes brjod de sku'i gsang ba/ oM badzra gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod de thugs kyi gsang ba/ oM ratna gu hya aM
255b3(rgyud 'grel): ste Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod de yon tan gyi gsang ba/ oM pad+ma gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ri zhes brjod de/ gsung gi gsang ba/ oM karmma gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a a zhes brjod de/ 'phrin las kyi gsang ba'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba sbyin pa'o/ /de nas chos
255b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi skye ba med pa nyid bstan cing/ oM pradz+nyA sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes bya bas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas ras sam grog la sogs pa la/ 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa bdun bris la/ oM ratna a b+hi
255b5(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa zhes dbang bskur ngo/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pas? rdo rje byin la/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra a b+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi taShi
255b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya stwaM zhes bya bas sbyin par bya'o/ a:zhes bya bas dril bu bskyed la sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas gdengs ka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA te dA si mi grih+na badzra su sid+d+hi ye/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha hUM/ rjes su snang ba'o/ /yang
255b7(rgyud 'grel): lag tu rdo rje byin la/ las kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM sarba karma Ni ku ru bud+d+ha nA ma hUM zhes brjod de brtul zhugs sbyin no/ /de ltar dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig byin nas/ slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon dang slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnam
256a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod de/ slob ma rnams yo byad kyis tshim par byas nas/ bstod cing mchod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bkrol nas gshegs su gsol te/ maN+Dal phyags te/ chu bo chen bor dor nas/ bskor ba dang/
256a2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i cho ga lus la bsrung zhing/ ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar dbang dang dam tshig thob pa rnams/ dngos grub la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa zhes bya ba'i phyir/ de nas
256a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston to/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa
256a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig gsungs zhe na/ sprul pa'i cho ga 'di zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di sgrub pas na sgrub pa ste/ byed pa 'am rgyu'i cho ga zhes bya ba'o/ /bsal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ ras kha
256a5(rgyud 'grel): tshar brgyad ? rin la brtsegs pa med par nyos la/ sbyin med pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig sngar bshad pa bzhin du/ seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje sku'i krung gis bzhugs pa/ zla ba ltar dkar ba zhal bzhil ting nge
256a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su ngan song spyod ba/ rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa ba mo'i mdog lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su shAkya thub pa mdog
256a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu/ phyag g.yon pad+ma bsnams pa phyag g.yas pad+ma 'byed pa bri bar bya'o/ /shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu phyag na rdo rje mdod
256b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lta bu/ g.yas na rdo rje bsnams shing thugs kar 'jog la/ g.yon snyen pa'o/ /de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi lha mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yon na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin can no/ /rta mgrin dang/ khams gsuM
256b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal gnyis mdog dmar po dang sngon po/ rang gi lha la brten par bri/ de gnyis kyis bar du/ lau tsA na dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ sgrol ma rnams rang gi spyan la sogs pa lag tu thogs pa bri/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdo rje
256b3(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /lha mo ni sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu dang/ de'i nang na chu srin dang/ nya dang/ rus spal dang/ sbal pa dkar po dang/ nya 'khar ba dang/ dung dang/ ping dang/
256b4(rgyud 'grel): srog chags du ma yod pa dang/ de nas chu las skyes pa'i me tog du ma yod pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ gos dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid
256b5(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal pa'i tshul gyis 'dug pa bri/ de nas ri mo'i gzugs de/ bsnyen pa dang bcas pas mngon par mchod de/ sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis rab tu gnas par bya zhing mnga' phul/ spyan dbye bar bya ste/ 'di ni 'di nyid kyi cho
256b6(rgyud 'grel): ga las shes par bya'o/ /bden pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bden pa ste/ spyan dbye ba'o/ /byin gyis brlab par dmigs pa ste/ mtshan ma la'o/ /de nas cis ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub
256b7(rgyud 'grel): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i las so/ /mtshan ma gang zhig yin zhe na bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang/ dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang zhes 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba mchog gi mtshan ma dang/ de bzhin dge slong bram ze dang/ zhes bya ba'i 'brang gi mtshan ma dang/ 'bras bu mthong na zhes bya ba mtshan ma tha ma las/ go rim bzhin du/ myur du mchog dang bar dang tha mar 'grub
257a2(rgyud 'grel): ces bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsnyen pa dang/ sgrub pa dang dngos grub ston te/ gzugs byin gyis brlabs te zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes sems dpa' bcug pas so/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab dbang
257a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur nas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ci bdog pa yis mchod par bya/ /rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang zhes bya ba ni/ mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod cing/ rnal 'byor gyis dus su rgyun mi 'chad par spyan sngar 'dug ces ston to/ /'jig
257a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas kyang/ /bdag gi de nyid dran byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ hUM bzhi'i sngags kyis bdag bsrung ba dang/ khrus kyi chog sngon du 'gro baS/ dkyil 'khor lus la brtags pa'i mthar
257a5(rgyud 'grel): thug pa byas la/ 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du/ bzlas par bya'o/ /de na dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya/ /sngags ni 'khral 'khrul med par bzlas/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnas dben par
257a6(rgyud 'grel): snga ma nyid kyi chogs brgyad brgyar sngags gug skyed? dang/ rtseg par la sogs pa chad lhag med par bzlas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de ltar bsnyen pa bstan nas/ de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsam la/ /mchod
257a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rgya cher byas nas kyang/ /mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya zhes bya bas sgrub pa bstan te/ bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i mjug tu dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bsams la/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas/ mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas
257b1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bras bu bstan pa ste/ cis ste gtso bo 'am de yis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to/ /ci ste gtso bo 'am dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'jig rten pa mthong ba las/ dngos grub rab 'bring gsol ba btab par bya ste/ phyag 'tshal nas
257b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /gal te 'bring ngam tha ma'i dngos grub mig sman la sogs pa yin no/ /bla ma dang dkon mchog la skal pa re re phul nas/ lhag ma bdag spyad dbul ba'i zhing med na bdag nyid kyis spyad/ mchog gi dngos grub yin na/
257b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can la phan par brtson pa bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste dngos grub 'thob na/ las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin rgyu skar gdon la sogs pa tshig tsam gyis bran bzhin du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur
257b4(rgyud 'grel): ro zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sdig pa chen po byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa thabs sla bas grol ba bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bco ldan 'das
257b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar na dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ shi ba rnams ji ltar
257b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las/ thabs
257b7(rgyud 'grel): sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig /zhes bya ba ni nyon la zung zhig pa'i don to/ /thabs de nyid de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /de ltar yang na buM pa la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag /ces bya ba sngar bshad
258a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du/ bsnyen pa dang/ sa'i cho ga dang/ lha rnams mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas/ bum pa la sngags bzlas te/ lho sgo'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor du bcug cing sngar bshad pa bzhin du dbang bskur
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de'i 'bras bu de nas sdig pa kun spyangs te/ dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/ de ni myur du thar par 'gyur/ sdig las rnam par grol bdag nyid/ /dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi/ /rigs su skye bar gyur nas kyang/
258a3(rgyud 'grel): de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang/ /chos 'gro ba ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/ /rim gyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /de yang ci zhig las dbang bskur zhe na/ de yi gzugs brnyan dri bar ni/ /gur gum gyis
258a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ming byang rug zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngan song kun gyi 'jigs? chen las/ sems can rnams ni dgrol ba'i phyir zhes gsungs te/ su zhig gis zhe na/ sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing/ snying rje can gyis dbang bskur
258a5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /des ni thabs dang po bstan to/ /gzhan yang de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang/ /mchod rten dbus su bzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni/
258a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ? la sogs pa mdun du bzhag la/ lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs pa nas bzung ste/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ nam mkhar dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang/ mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de/ ji lta ba'i go rim gyis
258a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub pa mngon du byas nas/ babs te dkyil 'khor bsreg byas te/ gzugs brnyan la sogs pa la 'od zer gyis shes pa bcug ste/ sdig pa 'joms pa la sogs sngon du 'gro bas/ rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du
258b1(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlabs la/ sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ mchod rten gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan rang gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi/ snying po snying gar bris nas kyang/
258b2(rgyud 'grel): lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de/ byim gyi nang du bzhag par bya zhes bya ba ni dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa shi bar gyur na/ shes na rang gi lha'i snying po snying gar bri/ lha dang 'dra bas sems kyis brtag /ma shes na lha gang yang rung
258b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying po snying gar bri?/ lha 'dra sems kyis brtag /khyim mam/ dur khrod dam/ 'chad pa'i nang du bzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni thabs sla ba gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang de nas smos nas ni/ /gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la/ /rim gyi
258b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bum ni tshad tsam du/ /mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig can sdig ni zang bya'i phyir/ /bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya/ /des ni nges par dmyal gnas nas/ /de byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dags byol song sdug bsngal las/ /grol nas lha yi
258b5(rgyud 'grel): nang du skye/ /zhes bya ba ni/ de'i ming nas brtsams te/ sngar bshad pa'i sngags/ oM sarba bde ces bya ba nas/ ba zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa/ gur gum bzang pos/ ras sam khro ba nag pos byas pa la/ 'bum tshang bar tse ta? byas te/ mchod rten
258b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi las bya'o/ /sdig pa bzang par bya ba'i phyir bye ba snyed du gdab par bya'o/ /de ni dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ yi dags las grol te/ lha'i gnas su skye'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'di'i don ni cho ga nyid las shes par bya'o thabs ? pa'i?
258b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang de'i ming nas brjod nas ni/ /'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni/ /brgya phrag stong du chang ba dang/ /bye ba snyeng du rab bzlas na /lha yi gnas su skye bar nges zhes bya ba ni/ sbyor ba dang po dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ las kyi
259a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po mchog dang/ sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas/ de'i ming thog mar smos te/ gong du bshad pa'i sngags 'bum phrag stong dang/ brgya phrag stong tshang ba dang/ bye ba snyeng du bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa
259a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro bas mtshan thog thag bzlas na/ lha'i gnas su nges par skye zhes bya ba'i don to/ /thabs sla ba lnga pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang de'i ming nas brjod nas ni mkhas pas 'bum phrag rgya'am ni/ yang na stong phrag brgya snyed du/ sbyin sreg
259a3(rgyud 'grel): byas par gyur na ni zhes bya ba ni thabs khung ji lta ba bzhin du brkos te/ rdzas bzhag cing bsang ba byas nas rang lhar bskyed de/ chos kyi yi ge las thab khung byin gyis brlabs la/ pa dang sha ba ko ba'i bud shing brtsigs te/ rgyun bzhag
259a4(rgyud 'grel): gi me spar nas me lha spyan drang ba sngon du 'gro pas dgang blugs la sogs pa phul te 'bar ba dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ba'i me lha 'am/ yang ni me lha'i snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' la dgang blugs la sogs pa phul ba/ sngags dang ming
259a5(rgyud 'grel): spel? te/ til gyi sbyin sreg gis mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am/ brgya phrag stong snyed du sbyin sreg byas la/ lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ zhes bya ba ni don to/ /de'i 'bras bu ni dmyal ba chen por gyur pa
259a6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ sdig pa de las thar par 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /yang dus ji srid du zhe na/ ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni/ /'bar ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ mtshan ma yang dag 'byung bar du zhes bya ba de srid du'o/ /rdzas ci zhig zhe na/ til dang yungs
259a7(rgyud 'grel): kar 'bras rnams dang/ /ba yi 'o mar ldan pa dang/ /dri yis bskus pa'i yam shing dang/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya zhes gsungs so/ /sdig pa las thar pa'i mtshan ma ni/ de yang de ni nges par yang/ /lha yi gnas su skyes 'gyur nas
259b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi mtshan ma ston par byed/ /yang na lha yi mchog tu gyur/ /yang na hoM khung nang du ni/ /me yi ltas ni ston byed cing/ /lha yi gnas su skye ba dang/ /sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni/ /dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar/ /gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma
259b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /? zhing rnam par mi 'gro la/ /brtan la klo ga bzhin dri ma med/ /yang na me lha nyid kyis ni/ /bdag nyid de nyid sten byed cing/ /zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la/ /bzhi mdog dkar zhing lha mer 'bar/ /des na mtshan ma 'di dag gis/ /dmyal ba
259b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rnam grol zhing/ /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya zhes bya bar ni/ thar pa'i mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don do/ /thabs sla ba drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du khung
259b4(rgyud 'grel): ? la/ rdo rje tha mar brkos? pa yi/ /'khor lo dbus su dri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yin ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams kyang ni/ /'jig rten rtse la sogs pa bri zhes bya ba ni dang por stegs bu'i chad
259b5(rgyud 'grel): khru sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa/ brtsigs la/ khru bzhi pa'i smad du zabs su khru do pa'i tshang gyi khung du brkos la/ sor bcu drug pa'i phyi rol du sor bcu drug yod pa'i mthon dman ldan pa/ de la rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas bskor/ de'i dbus
259b6(rgyud 'grel): su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor bar bri/ /lte ba la sogs rnams su rigs lnga'i phyag rgya rnams shar la sogs pa ji bzhin pa'i phyogs su rang bzhin du bri/ de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa/ sems dpa' 
259b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug gi rdo rje la sogs pa bri/ de'i phyi rol grwa dang sgo rnams la/ lA sye dang lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri/ khyams kyi nang du byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri/ phyi rol gyi khyams la rim pa dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum
260a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje la sogs pa dang/ par bu dang gseg shang dang/ 'khor lo rnams bri bar bya'o/ /sgo rnams la khro bo'i phyag mtshan rnams bri bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gtso dang ma mo dang/ mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thig le dang/ ming
260a2(rgyud 'grel): du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang bya dang bum pa gang ba dang/ gtor ma'i gnod rnams bkang ba brgyad dang bcu drug rnyed dag /bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bshos dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ bla re rgyal mtshan dang/ dar dang lnga
260a3(rgyud 'grel): ldi? rnams bzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor dam par sbyin sreg gi phyir bzhag pa yin no/ /cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang/ /lha rnams mang po spyan drangs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni cho ga shes pas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris nas te/ thugs
260a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin ston cing dngos po mtshan ma bsregS pa ni/ thugs gcor gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /kyang zhes bya ba ni lhag chad zhi ba sngon du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin gsum dang/ bzlas brjod byed cing sgo dbye ba bsdu'o/ /lha rnams mang po spyan
260a5(rgyud 'grel): drangs pa ni/ bsdu zhing lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas pa'o/ /sngags zhes pas ni sngags phyag rgya/ arga phul ba zhes pas kyang zhes bya bas ni mchod yon dgul ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya bzhes rgyas gang ba/ dbang bskur bas
260a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhes pas ston to/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bsdun mchod par 'dus pas/ de skad ces bya'o/ /lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas pa'o/ /de lha'i
260a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi tshe na/ lha rnams mchod nas rdzas bstan pa'i phyir/ ga pur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams la/ /dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chan yos dang
260b1(rgyud 'grel): la du dang/ /bdud rtsi ka rar ldan de bzhin/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la/ /yaM shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing/ /khung bu'i nang du gzhug par bya zhes bya ba la rdzas de rnams kun la/ oM sarba bdi ces
260b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nas/ b+ha zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sngags brgya phrag du mar bzlas shing/ sngags de nyid btab pa'i shing bshad dang/ bkod pa mchod rten gyi dbus su brtsig par bya ba'i don ro'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/ dang po re zhig ngan 'gro las dgug
260b3(rgyud 'grel): cing sdig pa sbyangs la/ bye ma dang nyungs kar gyis spangs te khrus byas la/ yang sa stegs sngon po'i steng du bzhag pa las bum pa sngon pos bkru zhing/ 'gro ris dang lam bstan te/ me tog gi char phab la/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ji lta
260b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du/ dkyil 'khor du bcug la bum pa la sogs pa bsdus te/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dam pad+ma la bzhag nas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bskyed de/ chu mchog gis ni bkrus la/ dris byug cing rgyan sna tshogs pa btags la
260b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pa la sogs pas bdug cing mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod cing/ rol sngags kyis btab nas ni/ chu mchog gis ni bkru bar bya/ /bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang rgyan gyis kabs nas kyang//
260b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas gdugs/ /me tog? phreng ba sogs pas mchod ces bya ba 'di bstan to/ /de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du/ sngags bri bar ni gdags par bya zhes bya ba ci sngags bris pas
260b7(rgyud 'grel): gdags par mdong bstan to/ /snying ga lkog ma kha phyogs su/ /sarbba bida? kyis byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM sarba bida badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya bas snying ga lkag ma'i phyogs la sogs pa rnams su
261a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te/ mdor bstan pa'o/ /sngags bri ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gnyis bshad pa ni/ dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo gtsug bud dpung pa gnyis/ /sna dang rked pa pus mo bol//
261a2(rgyud 'grel): long bu sna yis rtse mo dang/ /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni/ /de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags/ /mchog tu dge ba rnams bshad do/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gnas bco brgyad du 'god pa ste/ yi ge zhes
