291b7(rgyud 'grel): a zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ de ltar yi ge rnams bzhag par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos pa bskyed de ces bya ba ni/ g.yas pa la oM las rnam par snang mdzad?/ hUM la sogs pa la ni mi bskyod pa la sogs
292a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bskyed/ g.yon phyogs las oM las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ hUM la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bskyed de ces bya ba'i don to/ /chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang/ gdan rjes su
292a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun par byas te/ ces bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa yab yum rnams/ badzra any+dza la zhes rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba dang/ bdag gis kyang de'i don bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to/ /lag pa gnyis pad+ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas/ oM zheS
292a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang/ a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hUM zhes pa dang/ h+ri zhes bya ba gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya ba h+ri zhes bya ba gnyis gzhibs te brkyang ba 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las
292a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig gi'o/ /ces bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs te brkyang ba ni sdig pa sbyang ba la sogs pa las thams cad las
292a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang/ de las rab tu 'khor lo dang 'dra ba dang 'khor lo'i zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje thal mo de nyid rnon po ltar byas te bskor nas? 'khor lo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid
292a6(rgyud 'grel): las khar bzhag pa ni sgra ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid gar bzhag pa sgra'i ste phyag rgya'i tshig du 'gyur ro/ /de nyid gnyis su byas nas las kyi phyag rgyar byas nas las kyi'o ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje thal mo
292a7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gnyis su byas nas rdo rje khu tshur du byas te/ rang rang gi sbyar na las su 'gyur ro/ /g.yon pa thod thogs 'dra ba dang/ g.yas pa mdud rtse gsum pa ces bya ba ni/ g.yon pa mgo thod thogs pa 'dra bar byas la/ g.yas pa
292b1(rgyud 'grel): mthe bos mtheb chud mnan te/ lhag ma gsum mdud rtse gsum pa ltar byas pa ni ma mo dang gshin rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa pad+ma kha 'dzum pa dang g.yas pa oM zhes bya ba bzhag ces bya ba ni/ g.yon pa pad+ma kha 'dzum pa lta bu byas
292b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ g.yas pa mthe bong kha'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni tshangs pa'i'o/ /g.yon pa 'khor lo dbyug to rtse gsum ces bya ba ni/ g.yon pa 'khor lo thogs pa ltar byas la/ g.yas 'byug? tho rtse gsum ltar byas pa ni/ dbang phyug chen po'i
292b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o/ a dang oM ni rtse sprang pa/ lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can ces bya ba ni g.yas pa'i mthe chung dang mthe bod rtse sprang nas lhag ma gsum rdo rjer byas pa ni brgya byin gyi'o/ /hUM dang/ oM gnyis gzhung byas la/ lhag ma mdar byas mda'
292b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi'o/ /ces bya ba ni mdzub mo dang gzhur byas la sor mo lhag ma mngar byas pa ni mda' gzhu can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khor lor bya/ /'di ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal ces bya ba ni/ g.yon pa dgrad pa zla ba yi g.yas
292b5(rgyud 'grel): ba bgrad pa nyi ma'i 'o/ /thal mo dam sbyar sor mo spro/ /gza' lag rtag tu se gol gtogs zhes bya ba ni/ thal mo sbyar ba sor mo 'khrol ba ltar byed cing se gol gtogs pa ltar byed pa ni gza' lag go /de nyid tshig dbang? gsungs pa
292b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mchu la tshig 'bru 'dra bar bzhag /ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo nyi ma chu las tshig 'byung ba 'dra bar bzhag pa ni phur bu'o/ /pa bsangs ni mnyam nyid sbyar ces bya ba ni thal mo mnyam nyid sbyang ba ? sangs dang mig dmar gyi'o/ /spen pa
292b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa 'dzin par bya/ /ces bya ba ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa ltar byed pa ni/ spen pa'i'o/ /ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra ces bya ba ni mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis glang po che dang chu srin g+gyi sna 'dra ba sgra gcan gyi yin par shes par bya'o/ /ces bya 
293a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don to/ /rgyu skar me stag 'phro ba 'dra/ /de nyid bskor na glog 'phreng gi/ bla 'og bzhag pa sprin phyag rgya/ /ces bya ba ni me stag 'phro ba ltar byas pa rgyu skar gyi'o/ /de nyid skor ba glog gi'o/ /thal mo bla 'og
293a2(rgyud 'grel): tu bzhag pa sprin gyi'o/ /'di dag snying po phyag rgya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag yin no/ /ces bya ba ni/ thugs dam tshig snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'jig rten pa'i las kyi phyag rgya yang 'di dag nyid do/ /de nyid las srin lag sbas pa ni phyag
293a3(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje'o/ /zhes pa ni/ rdo rje thal me de nyid las mdzub mo'i tshigs bar ma bcag pa ste/ dbang bskur ba rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste/ de nyid las hUM ces bya bas tshigs par ma bcag pa ni/ dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/ nam
293a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba gshegs pa la srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di pad+ma 'byung ba'i 'chags pa'i phyag rgya'o ces bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis bzhi bas srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar bya ba ni rnam par
293a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba dang/ h+ri zhes bya bas bshibs te bsgreng ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya'o/ /de
293a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni/ bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa dang/ 'od ? zer 'phro ba ni bde ba chen po
293a7(rgyud 'grel): dang kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid nang du bkug na ni/ khro bo sna tshogs gzi can no zhes bya ba ni thal mo nang du bkug pa khro bo yi'o/ /de nyid las shin tu bsdams pa'i rdo rje gdams pa'o/ /brkyang ba ni bsrung ba'o/ /h+ri zhes bya ba sa
293b1(rgyud 'grel): bon ni gnod sbyin gyi'o zhes bya ba sor mo gdams pa rdo gdams pa rdo rje tshig phyag rgya rgyu dang/ /brkyang nas mgul du 'khyud pa bsrung ba'i dang/ mdzub mo mche ba gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /hUM zhes bya ba lcags kyud byas pa ni bkug pa'o/ /de nyid mdar byas
293b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'dod pa'o/ /oM dang hUM gnyis sbyar ba dgyes pa'o zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas pa rgyal po'i'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis mdar byas pa chags pa'i'o/ /mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis se gol gtogs pa ni legs ba'i'o//
293b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /bskor ba bzhag pa ste de nyid khar bzhag na dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa ya mtshan no/ /ces bya ba rdo rje bsdams pa las
293b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar pa lngar byas pa gzi brjid kyi'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nyid thal mor byas pa nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /de nyid bskor nas kha phyogs bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i'o/ /thal mo pad+ma bkug pa ni pad+ma'i'o/ /a zhes
293b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ oM zhes bya ba gnyis nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i'o/ /gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i'o/ /snga ma las oM zhes bya ba gnyis khar bzhag pa ni 'byung ba ste ces bya ba thal mo pad+ma dang/ mthe chung dang/ mthe bong bkug
293b6(rgyud 'grel): nas lhag ma ral gri dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ mthe bong gnyis khar bzhag pa ni go rim bzhin du chos dang rnon po dang/ 'khor lo dang smra ba'i phyag rgya'o mdor na phyag rgya ni las gyi phyag rgya sbyin par byed pa? bya ba ni yon tan mdor ba? na/ las
293b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin bar byed pa'o zhes bya'o/ /de nyid bsdus mdud bdud mgor 'gyur ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo de nyid las mtshams gnyis bsdus la/ sor mo'i rtse mo bsdus nas sdud de sbrul mo ltar skyes pa ni/ klu chu lha'i phyag rgyal/ /kun
294a1(rgyud 'grel): tu gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra ba ces bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas pa ni gnod sbyin no/ /srin po yi ni khra 'phrog pa zhes bya ba khrag 'thung ba ltar byed pa srin po'i 'o/ /lag pa bskor ba rlung ge'o/ /dbyug
294a2(rgyud 'grel): to ldan pa gnod sbyin no/ /bum pa bzhag pa nor gyi'o/ /ces bya ba ni lag pa bskor ba rlung lha'i'o/ /dbyug to ltar byed pa gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /lag pa gnyis bum pa ltar byed pa ni nor lha'i'o/ /mthe bong ne le'i rna 'drar bya/ /mgo po thod
294a3(rgyud 'grel): pa nag po ste/ b+h+rid? gi ri ti lag brkyang ba/ /pi wang g.yon thogs dri za'o/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba/ /gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin rje yi/ /ces bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo nyid mthe bong gnyis rna ba dang 'dra bar bya ba ni rnam thos bu'i 'o//
294a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa mgo thad mkhal ma'i phyogs su 'jog ba ni nag po chen po'i 'o/ /tha ma brgyad po ni b+h+ring gi ri ti'i 'o/ /g.yon pa pi wang thogs pa ni dri za'i 'o/ /lhag ma gnyis kyi sor mo me 'dra bar byas pa ni me lha'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis
294a5(rgyud 'grel): khung? mo dbyug pa 'dra bar byas pa ni gshin rje'i'o/ /rno la khro dang dbang sbyin pa/ /mthe chung ral gri mdzub bzhag can zhes bya ba ni thal mo las mthe chung gnyis ral gri ltar byas pa ni/ rno ba la gzhan la khro bo'i tshul du bya ba dang/ mdzub mo
294a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis zhags pa ltar byas pa ste/ gzhan la dbang du byed pa sbyin pa dang bcas pa chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rlung gi rgyal mtshan ras kyi gdong zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos mdzub mo mnan sor mo lhag ma
294a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ba dan ltar byas pa rang gi gdong du 'phyar ba ni rlung lha'i'o/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /lag yas skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'i phyag rgya de la sogs pa phyag rgya sna tshogs pa rnams rgyu lag pa
294b1(rgyud 'grel): las skye zhing bcing bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no/ /lha rnams kyi thun mong du/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bkra shis te/ /klu rnams zhes bya utpa la/ /de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal pa/ /bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol
294b2(rgyud 'grel): gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste/ /arga dbul ba rgyu skar rnams/ /de dag kun gyis sems bsgrub bo zheS bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi thun mong du thal mo pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /klu rnams kyi sor mo utpa la ltar byas pa'o/ /gnad
294b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin thams cad kyi sor mo rnams so ltar bya'o/ /srin po rnams kyi lag pa g.yas g.yon mgo bo'i tshal pa ltar byas pa'o/ /bud med thams cad kyi sor mo bcu bsnol ba'o/ /gza' thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas g.yon dbyug pa
294b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas pa'o/ /arga dbul ba ltar byas pa rgyu skar thams cad kyi ste/ de dag ni sems bskul ba 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /mgo bo thod pa khar bzhag pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni 'phra men ma/ /mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor
294b5(rgyud 'grel): ma yir bshad/ /de dag kun gyi thun mong du/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /thal mo brkyang ba bshad pa ni/ /yang na thal mo pad+mar bya zhes bya ba ni/ mgo thod pa khar bzhag pa ltar byas pa ni 'phra ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo mthe
294b6(rgyud 'grel): bod gnyis rtse sprad de/ srin lag dang mthe chung mig 'bras bu byas pa gud mo lcer brkyang ba ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad kyi thun mong brkyang pa dang/ yang na pad+mar byas pa'o/ /rdo rje
294b7(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /a zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnyis bsgrengs la/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ 'khrig ma bsnol mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel mdzub mo bsgrengs pa ni/
295a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo'o/ /rdo rje bsngams pa bsngams nas kyang/ /hUM dang a gnyis gzhibs te bsgred/ /oM zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'o/ /phyag rgya snang bar byed par dgongs ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje bsngams pa las/
295a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo dang mthe chung gnyis bzhi bas te bsgreng/ mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum snang gi'o/ /de la a zhes bya ba bcings zhes bya ba ni/ mthe chung nang du bkug la/ 'jig rten gsum mthar byed kyi'o/ /oM zhes bya ba
295a3(rgyud 'grel): nang du bkug /oM zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar/ /oM dang a yang 'dra bar bya ces bya ba ni mthe bong gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ mthe chung gnyis ni nang du sbyar/ mthe bong dang mthe chung gnyis 'dra bar sbyar ba ni/ mig.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya'o/ /d+h+ra da zhes bya ba gzhibs
295a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /a dang oM gnyis lu gu rgyud/ lhag ma bzhibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil bar shes par bya/ /ces bya ba ni gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng/ mthe chung dang mthe bong lu gu rgyud du sbrel/ /lhag ma gzhibs
295a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o/ /traM zhes bya ba bshibs nas ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin ces bya ba/ dbang po dang mdzub mo bzhibs pa ni be con sngon po'i'o/ /de ltar hUM zhes bya ba gzhibs/ /lhag ma 'od gzer 'bar bar bya/ /rta mgrin
295a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /de yang las rnams kun la gsungs zhes bya ba ni/ mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te lhag ma 'od gzer ltar byas pa rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya ste/ las dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa yin no/ /khro bo
295a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan ni mig dang 'dra bar bshad/ /mA ma kI ni rdo rje bshad/ /dkar mo pad+ma nyid du bshad/ /utpal ni sgrol mar dgod/ /ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsngams pa la mdzub mo dang mthe chung mig ltar byas pa ni sangs
295b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas spyan kyi'o/ /mdzub mo rtse mo 'gug pa gud mor byas pa ni mA ma kI'i 'o/ /gung mo dang srin lag pad+mar 'dra bar byas pa ni gos dkar mo'i'o/ /mdzub mo bkug pas gung mo la bkra shis ta/ mthe bong ngos la bcar ba ni sgrol ma'i
295b2(rgyud 'grel): utpa la'o/ /gang phyag rgya ma bshad pa thams cad ni/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs par shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rtog pa thams cad kyi lha bskyed pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhom pa dang/ brdud ba'i sngags ni badzra satwa hUM/
295b3(rgyud 'grel): dzra rA dza dza/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgya drug rdo rjes sems dpa' la sogs pa'o/ /oM bud+d+ha lau tsA na hUM/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi'o/ /badzra mA ma kI hUM/ mA ma kI'i'o/ /badzra paN+Ta re da hi de hi/ sid+d+ha bo d+hi lo koTTa? ra b+h+raM swAhA/ gos dkar mo la'o//
295b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tA re tut+tA re tu de hUM hUM hUM swa swa swa sgrol ma'i'o/ /sems pa bcu drug gi snying po dang/ sbyar ba'i sham pa ta bcu drug zhi bar brdud ba'o/ /de bzhin sbyar ba gung bcu drug rgyas pa'i brdung ba'o/ /de bzhin sbyar ba bcu drug dbang gi
295b5(rgyud 'grel): brdud ba'o/ /de bzhin sbyar ba bcu drug mngon spyod kyi brdud ba'o/ /'dir ma gsungs pa'i sngags pa thams cad yang gzhan dag las shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir rgyud phyi ma'i bde ba chen po dang/ de yang gtsug tor du gsang sngags dang
295b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i khyad par gsungs zhe na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad de gnyis kyi nad gi 'dus pa'i phyir gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de ltar rgyud phyi ma bshad nas da ni rgyud phyi ma'i yang phyi ma bshad pa'i phyir 'zug par bya ? ?
295b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas ces bya ba la sogs pas ston to/ /'dir ni khro bor gsungs pa ston te/ de yang 'og nas khro bo'i sku'i 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas/ phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal te/ khro bo'i dkyil
296a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bshad pa'i phyir/ gsol ba 'debs pa nyid du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pas lha rnams mgu nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal nas/ khros pas khro ba spangs pa'i phyir gsol ba
296a2(rgyud 'grel): 'debs pa nyid du gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sku bor te zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i sku bor te'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sku zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni khro bo sems dpa' i skur gyur ba'o/ /'dis
296a3(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin ston to/ /gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje'i skur bskyed la/ 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyis khro bo'i skur bsgyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rdo rje gnyis su med
296a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mnyam pa zhes bya bas ni sems dang sems las byung ba gnyis su med pa thugs rje chen po mtshungs pa'i khro bo'o/ /de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya ste/ de'i snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon du mdzad ba'o/ /rdo rje sems
296a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' khro bo zhes bya ba ni khro bo sems dpa' nyid do/ /me'i rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ khro bo lhag ma rnams te/ dbyer mi byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i snying po'o/ /de nyid kyi des
296a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes las byung ba'o/ /de nyid oM badzra kro d+ha a na larkar ma hA badzra/ badzra kro d+ha dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba bi dra ba/ sarbba a ba ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ra ha ra pra NaM hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /oM trai lokya ki ra hUM phaT/ 'jig
296a7(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum snang gi'o/ /oM gri lo kya da ma ka hUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum 'dul gyi'o/ /oM trai lokya nA sha hUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum 'jig gi'o/ /oM trai lo kya an+ta ka hUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum mthar byed kyi'o/ /oM a mri ta hUM phaT/ oM bdud
296b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'khyil pa'i'o/ /oM kA la daN+Da hUM phaT/ be con sngon po'i 'o/ /oM ka la ha ni hUM phaT/ mi g.yo mgon po pa'i 'o/ /oM ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ rta mgrin gyi'o/ /oM ka la aM ku sha hUM phaT/ lcags kyu'o/ /oM ka la pA sha hUM phaT/ zhags pa'o/ /oM
296b2(rgyud 'grel): ka la band+ha hUM phaT/ lcags sgrog go'o/ /oM ka la g+haN+Da hUM phaT/ dril bu'o/ /oM ka la rak+Sha se hUM phaT/ srung mi'o/ /oM ka la daN+Da hUM phaT/ be con ma'i'o/ /oM ka lar Ti hUM phaT/ dga' ma'i'o/ /oM ka la yak+Sha si hUM phaT/ gnod sbyin gyi'o//
296b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gos ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bstan to/ /gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog sgom pa rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa' i thugs su sngags bkod la bskyod do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ting nge 'dzin
296b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ni de bzhin du sngar bstan pa las shes par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las ston te/ bsnyen pa dang lhag par gnas pa'i chos thams cad spyad pa de nas khro bo'i dkyil
296b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yangs pa rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'od zer 'bar bas bkrigs shing/ cher 'bar bar snga ma ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas lte ba la rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag par bya'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ shar gyi rtsibs
296b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la/ gsum snang dang gsum 'dul/ lho'i rtsibs gnyis la gsum 'jigs dang gsum mthar byed/ nub kyi rtsibs gnyis la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang be con sngon po/ /byang gi rtsibs gnyis la/ mi g.yo mgon po dang rta
296b7(rgyud 'grel): mgrin/ me'i phyogs kyi rtsibs bcu bsrung ba'o/ /srin po'i phyogs kyi rtsibs la be con ma/ rlung gi phyogs kyi rtsibs la dga' ba mo/ /dbang ldan phyogs kyi rtsibs la gnod sbyin mo/ /khro bo brgyad 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad mnon pa zhal 
297a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa/ phyag brgya phrag du ma mda' ba/ sbrul dang thod kyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags smad kris byas pa/ rgyu ma thogs pa sprul pha phyag dar? dbu mdza' yas pa 'byung ba/ de dag kyang mgo thod shas
297a2(rgyud 'grel): bkang pa phyag na thogs pa bri/ phyi rol na srin mo bdun cu la sogs pa bzhag /sgo ba rnams lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan thogs par bri/ de nas bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bcu drug bzhag /bdug pa dang/ me tog /dri/
297a3(rgyud 'grel): mar me/ kha zas kyis bkang ba'i gtor ma/ bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bdud rtsi mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams bzhag ces bya ba yin no/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang/ /mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas gzhug /phyag rgya de dang de
297a4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig gsol/ /de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni/ /zhes bya ba la de ltar dgongs pa'i mtshams la bca' ba dang/ slob dpon gyis mgo thod kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ chad pa dang lhag
297a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par bya/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas sgo dbye/ bsdu na nam mkha' la mgo thod kyi phyag rgya de dang/ rnal 'byor de'i sha rnams kyi dam tshig gsol lo/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed nas/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags
297a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas 'grub par bya'o/ /de nas sngags mkhan sgor bsgom/ de nyid dran byed bsnyen par byed ces bya ba ni/ lcags kyu la sogs pas las bya zhing/ bgegs bskrad/ bsrung sgo bcad/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab/ dbang
297a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bya ba'i don to/ /de ni nges par dngos grub ster/ /yud tsam 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang/ /rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /rgyud las byung ba'i dam tshig brjod ces bya ba ni/ dngos grub
297b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha rang gi tshogs la rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi dam tshig thog ma dang tha ma med pa de srid kyi bar du brjod do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas mchod de langs nas
297b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /tshogs can rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya/ /zhes pa ni mchod pa dang/ gtor ma dang sbyin sreg dang/ gnang ba nang pa'i mthar thug pa byas la/ tshogs kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i tshul du
297b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas 'byung bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs ston te/ slob ma rnams snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad byas te lag tu rin po che thegs su bcug la/
297b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra kro d+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM phaT zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor du bcug la/ rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs pa bzhin du/ cho ga lhag ma rjes su bcad nas/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM phaT
297b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo'i bum pa'i dbang bskur la/ dbang bskur ba nyi shu po kun rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad pa bzhin dbang bskur bar bya'o zhas bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid du dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la dngos grub bstan pa'i phyir de nas de
297b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sgrub pa bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/ /de dag gi bsgrub pa bshad pa ni/ sngar bshad pa'i cho gas khro bo gang yang rung bar bskyed de/ snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi yi ge la khro bo dpag tu med pa bsgoms nas
297b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge dang gcig tu bsres te/ bsgom pa dang/ dang po bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa bsgoms na/ nges bar gsod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs te/ de nas snying gar nyi ma bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros
298a1(rgyud 'grel): nas yang dang yang 'phros shing/ /de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /de nas bsgrub 'gyur gzhan du min zhes gsungs so/ /khro bo'i las gsod pa kho na 'am zhe na/ gzhan yang yin par khro bo'i rgyal po las dngos su/ /
298a2(rgyud 'grel): gsod par yin par bshad mod kyi/ /zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams/ /'di dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo thams cad thun mong gi bsgrub pa bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ting 'dzin gnas/ /khro bo dkyil 'khor
298a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms byas na/ /sdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing/ /mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs/ /de bzhin de dag thams cad ni/ /thabs la sogs pas 'jig byed pa'i/ /khros nas snying mas 'gyur 'gyur bar/ /bsang pa'i las
298a4(rgyud 'grel): la bsam par bya/ /khros par gyur nas rgod pa'i las/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing/ /de dag 'tsho ba sreg par byed/ /bsams nas nges par brlag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'chi ba dang/ 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor las/ /bshad
298a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ltar rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ khro bo rdo rje sems par bskyed nas/ rang gi snying gar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te bdug pa dang/ rims la sogs pa thugs rje chen po'i thabs khro pos 'joms par bsams nas/ snying ga'i
298a6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor las khro bo spros te/ bzhad pa'i zhal gyi sha dang khrag 'jib cing/ srog dang bral bar bsnyen pa dang bsgrub par bsams nas nges par brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang khro bo 'jig rten gsum snad kha dog dkar po
298a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing/ de nas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor khyab par bsams la 'od de phyud nas/ rim pa la sogs pa ring du dor la 'od las hUM byung rdo rjer bsam zhing/ 'od las haM lta bu 'khor lor gyur go char bya/ 'od zer gyi chu yis spyi bo?
298b1(rgyud 'grel): nas dbang bskur de nas ming nas smos shing/ bzlas brjod dang/ bsnyen pa dang/ bsgrub pa tshul bzhin du bsams na/ 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i dag pa bsam shing/ /'od zer 'byung
298b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mang po yis/ /khyad par gyur par rnam bsams la/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /'od zer nges ni phyud nas kyang/ /de yi nang bgegs gnod pa sems/ /zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor/ /de nas hUM gi tshogs bzhag la/ /rdo rje lta
298b3(rgyud 'grel): bur lus bsams zhing/ /hUM gis 'khor los cho gar bya/ /'od zer chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de yi ming smos shing/ /bzlas pa'i tshul gyis bsam par bya zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gsum bstan pa ni/ de nas
298b4(rgyud 'grel): khung bu gsum las rnam gcig ni zhes bya ba la sogs bas dang po zhes bstan te/ de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang/ dbang gsum las/ zhi ba ni kha dog dkar po/ /tha ma ni khru gang/ bar pa khru do/ mchog khru bzhi'o/ /rnal 'byor pa de yis
298b5(rgyud 'grel): dang por sa rnams rab sbyangs te/ 'khor lo'i steng na zla pa'i dkyil 'khor/ dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa gcig /thab khung gi dbus su bri/ /de'i phyi rol gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa 'jig rten gsum snad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya 'od zer
298b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar por 'phro ba/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs brgya 'joms pa bye brag tu phye ba bri/ rgyal po bzhi'i phyag mtshan/ phyogs skyod rnams kyi phyag mtshan phyogs phyogs su bri/ lha chen po khyab 'jug la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag mtshan
298b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lta bur bri/ dri zhim pa'i chus bkang ba'i mdog dkar po'i ras kyis dkris pa'i bum pa brgyad bzhag /'bras chan dang/ zho dang mar dang/ dkar gsum pa'i gtor ma dang/ lha bshos dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ me?
299a1(rgyud 'grel): tog rnams kyang bzhag /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bla re dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ rnga ma la sogs pa bzhag /na ma re re ga bur dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po tsan dan la sogs pa'i byug pa'i byug pas byug
299a2(rgyud 'grel): kha shar du bltas te sbyin sreg bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyil krung ngam sems dpa' i skyil krung gis gdan la 'dug /gzhan yang gos sa sogs pa dkar po dang/ phreng ba dkar pos brgyan/ sreg pa'i rdzas bstan pa ni mar me
299a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spur rtsi dang/ nas kyi thug pa dang/ til mar dang/ til nyid dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'bras yos dang/ 'bras chan dang/ nas dang/ gro dang/ me tog dri zhim pa rnams ga bur dang bsres btsan dan dkar pos bsgos pa bzhag go /
299a4(rgyud 'grel): yam shing dang bud shing ni mdab ma brgyad pa me tog dang 'bras bu yod cing zhe dang ldan pa'i lam shing la/ khung bu'i khyad par gyi sor gyis gzhal zhing/ mchog sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad/ sor bcu drug thab khung par mal/ bcu
299a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang brgyad tham la/ gzhan yang bud shing zho dang ldan pa la rdo'i chus ? te/ bud shing de la rgyud gzhan la sogs pa'i me bcug ste/ dzbA la dzbA la hUM zhes pas/ rlung yab kyis me spar nas/ dri'i chus bsang gtar byas nas
299a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas me lha bskyed pa ni kha dog dkar po phyag g.yas pa gnyis na pad+ma dang nor bu/ phyag g.yon gnyis na ril pa dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma dkar po'i gdan gyi steng du de lta bu'i me lha bkug nas mchod yon dbul par bya'o/ /
299a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gi tshon khyad par mchod pa'i lha kha dog dkar po 'gro ba la phan pa'i khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su bsams te/ de'i theg tu spyan drangs nas bzhag par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du bsgrub par bya ba'i lus bzhag ste/
299b1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i 'od zer gyis nyes pa drangs nas phyi rol du dor bar bsam mo/ /mchod pa'i dus su nang bar snga bar khrus byas lus bris byug/ 'od zer bdud rtsi lta bur bsam zhing sbyin sreg bya ste/ dam tshig de ni 'da' bar mi bya ba kho na'o/ /de
299b2(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod pa'i rig pa ni sha chen la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang por me lha la phul/ de nas shar phyogs na bzhugs pa'i khro bo de'i? thugs kar spyan drangs la dbul/ de yang bsreg bya gsum du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i lus su sangs
299b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dkon mchog gsum spyan drangs la/ dkon mchog gsum dmigs yang lan gsum du dbul/ /gshegs su gsol te yang me la dbul/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs te rdo rje sems dpa' la dbul/ de nas
299b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lta re re la dbul/ de nas bgegs la sogs pa thams cad la dbul/ yang gshegs su gsol te rang gi lhag pa'i lha la dbul/ de nas dang por khro ba'i sngags kyis btab nas sbyin sreg byas te/ rdzas thams cad
299b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsreg nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis btab te/ sbyin sreg kun byas pa'i 'og tu brgya stong thams cad brgya rtsa brgyad khro bo spyan drangs ba la phul la/ 'od zer 'byung bas bsgrub par bya ba dbang bskur zhing/ haM gi go
299b6(rgyud 'grel): chab srung/ mjug tu lha thams cad la mchod pa brgyad la sogs pas mchod nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya gyen du bkral te/ oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol to/ /'dis ni zhe ba'i las 'grub pa la the tshom med do/ /
299b7(rgyud 'grel): ci ste sdig pa can nam ting nge 'dzin dang mi ldan nas dngos grub mi thob na/ dang po stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas gdon mi za bar dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i lus 'di tsam gyis mthar thug go zhes
300a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don to/ /de nas rgyas pa bstan pa ni/ 'bras bur ldan nam nags tshal lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ 'bras bur ldan pa 'am/ nags tshal lam/ gnas sam/ rgyal po dang rje'u rigs kyi khyim du
300a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa las dga' ba'i sems kyis byas te/ thab khung chung du khru do/ bar ma khru bzhi pa/ mchog khru brgyad pa/ gad yang rung ba cig tu byas pa'i las bya ba yin no/ /gzhan yang stegs bu dang phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ thab khud las stegs
300a3(rgyud 'grel): bu dpag par shes par bya ste/ thab khud khru ngo pa stegs bu khru brgyad/ thab khung khru bzhi la stegs bu khru bcu gnyis/ thab khung khru brgyad la stegs bu khru bcu drug gam nyi shu rtsa bzhir bya'o/ /thab khung khru do la mu khyud sor brgyad/ /thab khung
300a4(rgyud 'grel): khru bzhil mu khyud sor bcu drug /thab khung khru brgyad la mu khyud sor sum cu rtsa gnyis su bya ba yin no/ /de'i phyi rol du pad+ma sna tshogs pa rgyan par bya ba yin no/ /de'i dbus su rin po che pad+ma sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su thab brkob
300a5(rgyud 'grel): ni zabs su rgya'i byed kyi tshad gru bzhi pa 'am/ khru brgyad gang yang rung bar bya'o/ /'jim pa ser po'i sa skus shing gur gum la sogs pas byug nas tshon ser pos bskus te/ gser 'od dang 'dra bar bsam zhing bya'o/ /de nas tshen dmar ser
300a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rin po che dang/ pad+ma la sogs pa phyag rgya dkyil 'khor khor yug nyid du gnas su bri bar byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis sam/ thab khung dang mu khyud dang/ nang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ phyi'i dkyil
300a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ste/ bzhi'am nang gi 'khor yug dang/ mu? khyud dang 'khor mo dang/ lha'i gnas dang/ mu ran dkar po'i nang dang/ phyi rol dang/ 'gro ris kyi gnas dang/ yod na rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bri'o/ /sgo pa nyid kyang phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri'o/ /bum pa kha dog
300b1(rgyud 'grel): ser po dri chus bkang ba brgyad dam/ bcu gnyis sam/ bcu drug gam/ sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bkra shis pa'i dar ser pos bkri/ kha brgyan yal ga dang me tog can/ dri zhim pa'i me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ mar me dang
300b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phan dang/ bla re dang/ gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o/ /lha'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ni bdag nyid gos dang rgyan dang/ me tog la sogs ser pos brkyan/ /byang phyogs su kha
300b3(rgyud 'grel): bltas te 'dug nas khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' i rnal 'byor byed cing zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhan yang de nyid kyi tshem mchod pa'i lha byang phyogs su nam mkha' la lha'i bu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mdog ser po 'dra ba dang/ lha'i bu dang nyi
300b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang zla ba dang/ ku ba re dang/ nor sbyin dang/ dzam+b+ha lta kun kyang 'od zor gser lta bu 'bebs shing/ yid kyis dgongs pa sgong bar mdzad pa 'od zer chu yis dbang bskur bar bsam/ /de nas dbang thob nas lus rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /
300b5(rgyud 'grel): yang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir de'i ming dang gur gung? zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ byang phyogs su seng ge'i lta stangs kyi thog na/ rin po che'i khro/ yang na pad+ma dang/ nyi ma
300b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /zla ba'i gdan khri'i? steng na/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje gzi brjid dang/ rdo rje dpal dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa dang/ /bzhi pa rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin mdzad pa rin po che'i char dang/ /'od gzer gyis phreng ba
300b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bar bya ba la khyab par bsam mo/ /dung? dang/ cang te'ung ngo/ /pi wang dang/ sil snyan dang/ glu dang gar gyis de rnams mchod par bya ba ste/ de'i 'og tu sbyin sreg gi las brtsam mo/ /yam shing dang bud shing bstan pa ni/
301a1(rgyud 'grel): khung bu'i khyad par las yam shing dang/ bud shing dbye ste/ mdzub gang ba dang bcas khru gang ba ni chung ngu yin no/ /bar ma ni khru ngo khru bzhi pa ni mchog go /me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa me tog sbrang
301a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsis byug pa yin no/ /sreg par bya ba'i rdzas 'bru dang me tog dang/ 'bras bu ser po dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsir bsres nas dpal gyi 'bras bu lta bur byas pa yin no/ /mchod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir/ me lha kha dog
301a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag mtshan sngar zhib par bshad pa bzhin pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ spyan drangs te bsreg bya 'bul/ de nas de nyid 'bar bar bzhugs pa'i las su khro bo'i rgyal bo
301a4(rgyud 'grel): bcug nas/ sngon bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dran par byed cing sbyin sreg dbul ba ni/ 'bum 'am nyis 'bum gyis nges par dngos grub 'grub bo/ /'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid la dbang ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa
301a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub po/ /de nas mjug tu 'od gzer gyis dbang bskur zhing bsrungs na rgyas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no zhes bya ba yin la 'di tsam gyis ni rgyas pa'i las mthar thug go zhes bya ba'i don to//
301a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbang gis las ston to/ /dbang gi chags pa'i sems dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bya ba ste/ chags pa rdo rje can dang/ rdo rje chags pa de las byung zhing khams gsum
301a7(rgyud 'grel): chags par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' rtag tu chags pa de bas na dbang du bya ba'i las grub par bshad pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gnas ji lta bu zhig tu bya zhe na/ chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/
301b1(rgyud 'grel): chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis/ /btso blag mkhan nam zla mtshan dag gi /khyim du tshogs pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung/ /rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas/ /bde chen gyi ni gnas chen
301b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /pad+ma utpal rdzing bu dang/ /ban du ka yi me tog gnas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni/ /yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa/ /der ni zhes bya ba yin no/ /stegs bu dang thab khung bstan pa ni/ stegs bu khru brgyad zhes
301b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa ste/ stegs bu khru brgyad dam bcu drug rnams byas de'i dbus su hoM khung bya ba ni/ go rims bzhin du khru ngo dang/ khru bzhi par bya'o/ /dbyibs ni gzhu dang 'dra ba dang/ pad+ma 'dra ba dang/ mnga' 'dra ba dang/
301b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba bkam pa 'dra ba dang/ pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra bar byas la/ zheng du mchu'i byed kyi tshang zheng gi phyed kyi tshang zabs su brko/ mu khyud sor bzhi pa dang/ sor brgyad pa dang/ bcu gnyis pa dang/ tha ma dang/ bar ma dang/
301b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi khyad par lags so/ /yam shing dang bud shing dang ni/ so sor nges par bya ba zhi ba'i skabs su gsungspa ltar byas la /shin tu dmar ba'i tsan dan dang/ btsag dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ le brgan rtsi dang/ gur
301b6(rgyud 'grel): gum dang bcas pas bud shing dang yam shing la bsku'o/ /gzhan yang rdzas bstan pa ni/ yungs 'bru dmar po dang/ bcag dang mtshal dang/ zangs kyi phye ma dang/ yungs kar ske tse dang/ lan tshwa dang/ til dang zhim thig
301b7(rgyud 'grel): le'i 'bru dang/ la phug dang/ nyungs rdog dang/ khrag dang rdul chen po dang bcas pa kun bsreg par bya ba'i phyir bsdus nas btsag la sogs pas bskus nas/ khro bo'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ ba dang ra las
302a1(rgyud 'grel): zhos pa'i bsrubs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang/ mar dang til mar rnams ga bur la sogs pas bskus nas/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab te bzhag go /de nas hoM khung dmar por bsams
302a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ spos dmar po la sogs pas byug cing bskur bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang thab khung dang phyag rgya bstan pa ni/ gur gum gyis bsres pa'i mtshon gyi hoM khung gi nang du pad+ma bri/ de'i lta ba la mnga' dang gzhu bri/ de'i dbus
302a3(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje bri/ nang gi 'khor yug tu pad ma bri/ mu khyud la mnga' dang gzhu bri/ de'i phyi rol gyi khor yug la pad+ma nyid mnga' dang bcas pa bri/ de'i phyi rol 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dbang ldan gyi phyogs bcams te/ rdo rje
302a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mnga' gzhu dang gsum shar gyi rtsibs la/ lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la rin chen dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri/ nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la pad+ma dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo bri/ byang
302a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi rtsibs la sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ mche ba dang/ go cha'i mchog rnams bri'o/ /grwa rnams su spos la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ga'u gzugs bri/ de nas me tog la sogs thams cad kyi snga ma bzhin du mchod do/ /gos
302a6(rgyud 'grel): dang? 'phreng ba dmar po dang/ dmar ba'i dris bskus nas/ dmar thag 'chad par du las brtsams te bya ba yin no/ /khyad par du dbang la byin gyis brlab pa'i lha/ /pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /rab
302a7(rgyud 'grel): chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa la/ /g.yas su bde ba chen po ste/ /bsams nas de yis dbus su ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bzhag /rdo rje gzhu dang g.yon 'gyings ma/ /me tog
302b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar brgyan rab dgyes mo zhes bya ba la nub kyi pad+ma'i cha la/ rab chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'i spyan ras gzigs bri/ g.yon du rdo rje chags pa/ g.yas pa bde ba chen po/ yid kyis bri zhing bsams nas/ lte ba la chu srin
302b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal mtshan ma dang/ lha mo rdo rje klu dang lha mo rdo rje g.yon 'gying ma dang/ rab dgyes ma dang bcas pa bsam mo/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /dri la sogs pas rab mchod de/ zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du glu dang rol mos
302b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas/ badzra satwa hUM ho du ma zhes bya ba zlos shing dbang du byas pa'i phyir brjod par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i rim ba bstan pa'i phyir/ mnga' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ 'dir me lta phyag gnyis na
302b4(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu thogs ba/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dmar po dang dbyug po thags pa/ de lta bu'i me lha bcug nas dang por mchod de/ de'i lus su khro bo'i rgyal bo bcug ste mchod/ 'od zer dmar po byung nas de las lcags kyu
302b5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhags pas bsgrub par bya ba bkug cing bcings la spyi bor zhabs drung du bzhag par bsam/ de ltar bsams na yang dbang du 'gyur na mi dang mi min lta smos kyang ci dgos las zin par gyur pa dang/ chags pa'i sems
302b6(rgyud 'grel): su bcas nas spyi bo nas 'od zer gyis dbang bskur zhing haM gi go chas bsrung bar bya ba ste/ rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor gyis lha rnams mchod de/ dam tshig phyag rgya gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol la/ rdo rje bsdu bas
302b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs te/ rdo rje 'dod pa taM zhes bya ba bzlas nas/ langs la ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /'di tsam gyis ni dbang gis las mthar thug go zhes bya ba'i don to// //sdug pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
303a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang/ thog mar mchod pa rnams kyi mchod de bstod nas/ phyag rgya bkrol te gshegs su gsol ba ni/ de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pas/ de nas brgya byin la sogs
303a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ /rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gis/ /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang/ /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bstong pa byed? ces bya ba la/ de nas zhes
303a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ bar ma chad pa ste/ khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma dbang gi las la thug gi bar bshad pa'i rjes thogs la'o/ /brgya byin la sogs lha zhes bya ba ni/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khro du
303a4(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ zhes bya ba yin no/ /yang dang yang du phyag byas shing rin po che'i gdugs la sogs pas mchod pa ni mchod par byas pa'o/ /de yang gsang sngags kyi spyang pa spyong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil
303a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi bya ba la sogs pa rdzogs nas mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas bstod do/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor dgu'i bdag po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa zhi ba dang khro la zhes ston to /dga' 
303a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems kyis bstod pa byed ces bya ba ni/ yid bde ba'i sems kyis 'og nas 'byung ba rnams brjod do/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i sbyang pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor dgu'i skabs
303a7(rgyud 'grel): su 'dis bstod ngo zhes ston to/ /bstong pa'i rang gi ngo bo ston pa ni/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun bas sngar sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sgo nas so/ /mi shes dri ma
303b1(rgyud 'grel): kun bcom zhes bya ba ni/ 'dres pa'i ma rig pa spangs pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems dang/ rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni/ sku gsung gi rdo rje
303b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje sku ste sku che ba /zhes bya ba ni/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i sgo nas so/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje yan lag rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba ni/
303b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad du snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa bsregs pa'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje chen po'i
303b4(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyi sgo nas so/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon rnon po zhes bya ba ni/ thod pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi sgo nas so/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin phyag gi sgo nas so/ /rdo rje mnga' 
303b5(rgyud 'grel): ste rab 'bigs pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi sgo 'dod pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje rnon po rnon po che zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi sgo nas so/ /che ba chen po rgya mcho che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis
303b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ /rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i nyes skyon dang bral pa'i tshul gyis so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rang 'byung pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chen po kho nar nges pa'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen ste/ /zhes
303b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ don dam pa'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba/ /zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje rgyu te gnod sbyin che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa'i rgyI tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje pad+ma rnam
304a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi nyes ba dag par byed pa'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po cha/ /zhes pa ni/ /bro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /zhes
304a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni hUM mdzad du snang ba'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa bsrung ba che zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje bsrung ba'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed ces bya ba ni/ rgyal po'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /rdo rje ro langs
304a3(rgyud 'grel): ro langs che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ mahA de bar sprul pa'i tshul gyis so/ /rdo rje srin po za ba po/ /zhes ba srin por snang ba'i tshul gyis sgo nas so/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes bya ba/ gnod spyin du sprul pa'i sgo nas so/ /
304a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gdon gyi mchog ces bya ba dang/ gdon du sprul pa'i sgo nas so/ /'jigs byed dga' byed drag po che/ /zhes bya ba ni/ 'khru ba zag pa med pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rngam byed pa/ /zhes pa phyi
304a5(rgyud 'grel): rol mu stegs 'joms pa'i sgo nas so/ /bsgrub dga' bsgrub pa legs pa ste/ /zhes pa dga' ba spyong ba'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /zhes pa rdo rje legs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /rdo rje dga' 
304a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dga' ba zhes pa/ zag pa med pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa zhes pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /'ong sdug pas ni sdug pa che/ /zhes pa gzi brjid
304a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis so/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o/ /zhes pa sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis so/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /zhes pa byams pa'i rangbzhin gyis so/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje
304b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan yon tan gtso/ /zhes pa rin chen dang rgyal mtshan gyis rang bzhin gyis so/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /zhes pa ye shes lnga'i sgro nas so/ /rig pa bye ba tshogs kyi mchog /ces bya ba lha mo rnams
304b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag por snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /ha la ha la nag po che/ /zhes pa ni klu chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /dgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can/ /zhes pa 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i
304b3(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas so/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /zhes pa rdo rje chos su snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /rnyog ma dus ngan rnam 'joms pa zhes pa/ 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /skad cig g.yo
304b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i the tshom gcod/ /ces 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa'i sgo nas so/ /klog bzhin zhal gyi ltags? las 'phro zhes pa/ chos rgyud du gsungs pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje me ste ma rungs 'dul/ /
304b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa me ltar 'bar ba'i sgo nas so/ /drag por rab snang snang mdzad pa/ /zhes pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sgo nas so/ /nyi ma stong gi gdungs pa'i zhal/ /zhes pa gzi brjid chen po'i sgo nas so/ /spyan dmar 'jigs par
304b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /khro bo du ma'i 'od 'phros shing/ /phyag rnams du ma'i mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong/ /'khyil cing brgyan yang 'khyil pa la/ /zhes pa khro bo'i dkyil 'kho du snang ba'i sgo
304b7(rgyud 'grel): nas so/ /sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga' /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs zhes pa/ chos kyi sku'o/ /ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad ces pa/ nyon mongs pa
305a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum spong ba'i sgo nas so/ /rgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chad 'phrog ma/ /zhes pa ma hA de ba dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ brgya byin chung ma dang/ bcas par snang
305a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo nas so/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che zhes pa/ kun rig la sogs pa 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas so/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhes mos pa rab 'bring rnam pa gsum la
305a3(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /zhi zhing dul la dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtog pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsdus pa'i sgo nas so/ /rdo rje rab skyed rdo rje
305a4(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba/ /zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' i kun tu bzang po'i sgo nas/ mtshan rnams dam pas rnam brgyan pa/ /zhes pa mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sgo nas/
305a5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po/ /zhes pa khams gsum du snang ba'i tshul gyis so/ /thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang/ /zhes pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po
305a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid snang ba'i sgo nas so/ /de ltar bstod pa bstan nas/ phan yon ni gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to/ /skyes pa dang bud med gang gis so/ /'di bris zhes bya ba ni/ ras la sogs pas bris ba'o//
305a7(rgyud 'grel): klog 'gyur tam zhes pa klog pa dang/ /kha ton byed pa'o/ /rtag tu de dag 'chang byed dam/ /zhes pa bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i tshul gyis so/ /dran nas byed kyang rung zhes pa/ dran pa sngon du 'gro bas nyan pa'o/ /kyang
305b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la sogs pa dang/ mchod pa la sogs yang bsdu ste/ de lta bu dag kyang ngo/ /dgos pa ni ci zhig yod ce na/ phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa
305b2(rgyud 'grel): chen por 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba ston to/ /de yang gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa
305b3(rgyud 'grel): ba sngo zhing rjes su yi rang ste/ sgrub pa'i tshogs lus la bsdus la sprul pa bya ba nas ci bder gnas so/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba shAkya thub pa dang/ des byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag na
305b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang/ rgyud phyi ma dang/ phyi ma'i phyi ma'o/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i? 'khor rnams
305b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin bo la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ mi zhes bya ba yang shas che ba ste/ rdzu 'phrul rten pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
305b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang ngo/ /zhes bya ba 'bras bu thob pas mngon par dga' ste/ rgyud sprul pas bshad pa la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po brtag pa zhes bya ba sngar
305b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad ba bzhin no/ /phyogs gcig pa/ zhes bya ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang/ dpal mchog dang po dang/ rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa la le'u 'di phyogs gcig byas shing dum bu dka' ba la 'dul ba la bstan/
306a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i tha tshig go /ngan song rnam par sbyong byed pa'i/ /gzi brjid rgyal po snang brtsams pas/ /dge ba bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /'gro
306a2(rgyud 'grel): kun ngan song rnam sbyangs te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po brtags pa snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
306a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su bi dya ka ra warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// bkra shis/ //
